111.content:
[Chapter originally by: eva-dork]

The blue haired girl known as Rei Ayanami had emerged from the Sea of LCL approximately 245 days, 17 hours, and 12 minutes ago flat. The world had returned to normalcy, but the girl could observe startling differences. People seemed unchanged yet changed, particularly the Pilot Ikari. He had returned far earlier than she had, and unsurprisingly seemed different. She felt an emotion unlike others toward Ikari, a most perplexing emotion. What was this desire, this want? Was this the emotion known as love?

However, judging by the body language former Pilot Ikari displayed, he did not share Rei’s emotions of desire. To be exact, he possessed desire, but it was not directed at the wolfish-haired girl, but rather at the scarlet German girl, Asuka. Toward the girl, Rei felt an almost unfair emotion toward her, a resenting, foul emotion. Was this the emotion known as jealousy? Yes, perhaps it was. Whenever Rei even spoke to Shinji, even as a friend, the German had a mixture of odd emotions in her eyes. Were they jealousy, too? Part of her seemed afraid, frightened by Rei’s very presence, her disposition, her sense of being.

Perhaps Rei would never know.

“First!” Rei turned at the sound of Asuka’s condescending pet name for her. She never did like the name, though, considering she still refered to Asuka and Shinji as “Pilot” despite the trio having not used an Eva in the past couple years following Third Impact, it was only fair she’d be addressed similarly.

“Pilot Sohryu,” Rei replied in regard to the German.

“Listen, I’ve been doing some thinking lately,” Asuka said, scratching the back her head, “And I kinda realized I’ve been acting really immature lately.”

Was Pilot Sohryu apologizing? What a curious way she was doing it. She wasn’t making eye contact, which lead Rei to one of two possible solutions. Either Asuka was lying and didn’t want Rei to see her bluff, or she was so ashamed she couldn’t make eye contact. Judging by the facial expression accompanying her lack of eye contact, it lead Rei to believe the latter, but why was the jealousy insideo f Rei making her believe the German girl was lying through her teeth?

“Look, I’ve been a bitch to you. I really have, and truthfully you don’t really deserve it. I mean, I’ve just been really jealous. Shinji is…well, the idiot is…ya know.”

“I’m afraid I don’t, but I can forgive you,” Rei replied, bowing slightly.

“Listen, I gotta do something for you. Can I make you dinner sometime?” Rei considered Asuka’s invitation before finally speaking.

“I’m not fond of meat.”

112.content:
SEELE the most mysterious and intimidating organization on the face of the planet and Gendo Ikari sat there silent, unnerved. In a lot of ways Ikari was perhaps the only one who could face such a group with such a straight unmoving face.

"You have done well, Ikari. The children seem to be having no problem eliminating the angels."

"But they should be able to do such a feat at a much faster more effective rate."

"Especially the first child. She is your creation as such she should be perfect...and yet it seems at times your actual child surpasses her limitations. Do you wish for even the second to surpass her?"

Though he acknowledged them the senior Ikari said nothing in response. Soon enough the meeting was over...

The phone housed within Dr. Ritsuko Akagi's office buzzed uncontrollably alerting the blonde woman of the incoming call. A moment later she has the receiver to her ear.

"I see...I understand I'll run a test just to insure it's safety ('Even if it failed she could easily be brought back so why the worry?') if everything comes out as it should I'll inform you of the outcome at a later date."

The next day after the testing the children seem to go through every other day or so, Rei is approached by Dr. Akagi.

"Rei, if I could have an extra moment of your time. I'd like for you to come back with me to my office."

Silently the blue-haired girl nods, "Understood, Doctor Akagi." Before long the two walk away from Shinji and Asuka.

For a moment Shinji feels the need to ask the reason behind Ritsuko's sudden request. As the raven-haired boy takes a step forward Asuka places an extended arm in his path.

"Stop right there, Shinji. Why are you worried about Wondergirl all of a sudden?"

Asuka's comment caused the boy blush slightly, a smirk accompanied by a bit of a snicker leaves the redhead's lips.

"Ritsuko's a doctor for god's sake. It's not like she's going to hurt her. Though why she'd choose Ayanami over me is well beyond me..." wondered the quite curious Asuka.

"You don't even know what she wants with Ayanami. Why should you care?"

A bad choice of words as the redhead's right eye twitched, "It doesn't matter I'm the superior pilot. Obviously anything special or top secret should head my way!"

Shinji sighed as the enraged girl continued to rant onward, he could only hope Rei wouldn't take too long...

Within Akagi's office room Rei takes a seat directly across the doctor's desk.

"This won't take long, Rei. Simply make yourself comfortable."

Gently Ritsuko begins to apply a tiny portion of alcohol to Rei's slender neck.

"Doctor?" "Don't fret Rei, under the Commander's order you are to test a body enhancement serum." stated the older woman.

"Are steroids not dangerous for one's own being?" questions Rei.

"Oh this isn't like that it's our own personally-crafted formula. I assure you, this shall not bring about the ill effects commonly associated with steroids. Now hold still."

Rei wasn't sure how she felt about this unknown substance entering her body but she trusted in the Commander's decision, thus allowed herself to go along with his order.

Slowly but surely the chemical entered her blood stream. Afterwards there was strange sensation coursing through her very being, as if some new force was dismantling then reconstructing the outer and inner frame of body.

Grabbing a strong grip upon the handles of the chair she sat in, Rei felt her world spin, her breathing quickly intensifying. Despite her best efforts the young girl couldn't seem to bring even a simple word out of her lips.

"Relax Rei it will be all over soon. Believe me when I say this will not kill you. You must simply bare with the after-affects for a little while longer." stated Ritsuko, a trusting look in her eyes.

113.content:
It was another regular dull day within NERV headquarters, no angels have attacked in the last month or so so the Eva pilots Shinji Ikari and Asuka Langley were out about enjoying the rareity of free time, by Asuka shopping and using the quiet Shinji as nothing more than a pack mule.

The only one missing that day was Rei Ayanami who was currently in a large hangar with her Eva, undergoing an experiment proposed and supervised by Ritsuko Akagi. The experiment involved a special drug which held the possibilities of increasing the syncronization rate of pilots and was testing whether or not it would work.

The communicator earpiece Rei wore came to life, "You're doing good Rei. So far the drug appears to be a success." The one speaking was Ritsuko.

Appearing indifferent about it Rei replied, "Will Mr.Ikari be proud of this?" She wasn't referring to the young Shinji but in fact his father Gendo.

Again blaring to life the comm transferred Ritsuko's reply, "Of course Rei, he,Shinji,Asuka and everyone else will be very proud of you."

For a moment Rei appeared indifferent again but in a single second her stoic face formed a pleased smile, instantly shifting back into place the next moment.

"I see....." She muttered into the communicator.

"Don't worry about i-" Ritsuko was cut off by a loud beeping noise and the panicked words of one of the scientists there.

"Somethings gone wrong, the syncronization rate is through the roof. It's reached 80 percent and still skyrocketing!"

With a quick gasp Ritsuko yelled into the mic again, "Rei get out of there!!"

Still wearing a solemn expression Rei quickly disconnected from her Eva sucessfully, walking out of it calmly. Seeing Rei Ritsuki ran out of the observance room she was in and grasped Rei tightly on the shoulders, "Are you ok Rei!?!"

Appearing confused slightly the Eva pilot nodded, "Yes, I'm fine. Why did you abort the process? All of the systems were working perfectly."

Realizing Rei didn't realize what happened Ritsuko smiled weakly, "It's nothing you need to worry about, go on you can spend the rest of the day relaxing like Shinji and Asuka."

Carelessly Rei averted her red eyes, "Very well..."

1133.content:
Walking out of the large hangar Rei stared blankly at the sky, she knew little to nothing outside of NERV and thus free time seemed more like pointless time to her, but she wasn't needed anymore and she did all she could.

Thinking of something to do Rei came up with nothing but NERV related activities, it was unreal that her fellow pilots were so...normal compared to her. Thinking of her fellow pilots made Rei realize she could spend the day with them, more of a way of increasing their friendship and in turn teamwork than actually seeking enjoyment on her part.

As the blue haired teen left the room Ritsuko let out a sad sigh, realizing that with this being her experiment she would also have to be the one to face Gendo and inform him of its failure.

Pulling out a small light blue cell phone Ritsuko dialed a number and placed the device against her ear, almost instantly a voice on the other line answered. "Yes?" The voice was clearly Gendo's, it held the no nonsense tone he always had.

Ritsuko paused for a moment, thinking of how to break the news, "It's me. The experiment was a failure."

A brief silence came from Gendo, after a sigh he spoke again, "The subject in the experiment was the First Child correct?"

Taken slightly back by the odd question Ritsuko nodded despite the fact no one was with her, "Correct, the subject was Rei Ayanami."

"Redo the experiment, this time with the Second Child."

Nearly dropping her phone Ritsuko replied "A-Asuka?! But why?"

"There is a possibility the experiment failed due to the First Child's 'situation' We need to test it on another to be sure."

Ritsuko, seeing the logic of Gendo's words sighed, "Very well. I will contact Asuka via her phone and have her come immediately." With that Gendo hung up, ending the conversation.

Ritsuko once again began dialing a number, this time the number belonging to Asuka's cell phone.

Meanwhile Rei, out and about in the city spotted her fellow Eva pilots in a crowd. Asuka wore a pleased expression, along with seven shopping bags in each hand. Shinji was behind her, carrying roughly 12 boxes and 9 bags.

Approaching them silently Rei was just beside Shinji when she revealed herself, "Hello,"

Taken aback by the sudden appearance of his attractive friend Shinji fell over, dropping all of the things he carried and also earning a quick punch from Asuka.

Eyeing Rei somewhat rudely Asuka said, "Hey...."

Thinking Asuka wanted something Rei replied, "Yes?"

Then.....

Before this rather unique event went any further Asuka's cell phone went off. Answering it Asuka heard Ritsuko's voice, "Asuke get here ASAP for an experiment. Gendo's orders!" And as quickly as she called Ritsuko hung up.

Sighing Asuka placed her phone away, bending over to the bleeding Shinji and shoving a piece of paper into his face. "Be sure to buy these for me!"

Seeing the large scroll like list Shinji's eyes popped out of their sockets, "With what money?!"

"Yours of course!"

With her order Asuka turned around and rushed away, probably wanting to get back to her shopping as soon as possible.

Disgruntled Shinji felt something else come near his face, Rei's hand. "Are you okay?" She asked in her robotic voice.

Grabbing onto her hand Shinji hoisted himself up, again dusting himself off. Looking up at Rei Shinji saw what Asuka meant, Rei had to be six inches to a foot taller than him, it felt weird looking at his towering friend like that.

Turning an eye to Shinji Rei asked, "Do most gentlemen get into perverted situations like you?"

This time Shinji's jaw about fell off, by pure accident he had fallen into various perverted situations often involving Rei. "Um....no but......"

"Then you're no gentlemen, meaning no problem." The blue haired girl stated, lifting up a large amount of items with relative ease.

Shinji fell silent, nothing he could say or do would stop Rei so he just shrugged, "Fine, thank you for the help Rei."

Almost robotically Rei replied, "It's simply the smart thing to do with your situation."

Chuckling slightly Shinji piled the rest of the belongings on top of his already large pile and stood up, "No it's the right thing to do." "I know....." Taking a deep breath Asuka read the syncronization readings on a monitor beside her, so far her syncro rate was approximately 67% and steadily rising. The drug, if successful should stop at 95% and allow for optimum capabilities without truly threatening the pilot.

All seemed well until it finally happened, the rate suddenly plummeted, reaching zero; instantly skyrocketing back to its original number and still rising soon dwarfing the unreal number of 90 and rising at a rate of three points per second.

Exiting her safe room Ritsuko ran to Asuka, checking her pulse and vitals to be sure she was okay. "Asuka are you okay."

Similar to Shinji Rei also dropped the items she was carrying, yet her face was the normal stoic expression it always was, as if she didn't even care she was now eight feet tall.

Although it had only been a few seconds people already started to gather, sensing something was wrong. A group that began as Shinji and Rei soon turned to them and five strangers, then ten, then twenty and slowly more and more people came, circling the growing blue haired girl.

Now reaching ten feet in height Rei's clothing started to tear, a couple small seams in her pants and one of two along the back of her top but nothing that would reveal too much. As the crowd formed and expanded Shinji who was now almost a nervous wreck despite it not being him who was growing.

Futilely he attempted to pull the growing giantess away, of course with his lack of muscle and Rei's growing frame it was a miracle if he moved her an inch. Giving up the pull method Shinji ran to Rei's front, pushing against her stomach in an equally futile gesture.

It felt weird standing at his full height yet still only coming to Rei's navel, with a blush Shinji realized if she sprouted another foot his hands would be......

"Snap out of it!" He screamed, shaking his head and trying to push yet again. Sprouting another foot Rei was now closing in on 13 feet, and even still was indifferent about it.

People began murmuring to one another, Rei heard words tossed like, "Freak, weirdo, trick," and even "Angel" and slowly the entire crowd began using the negative words, any positive comments were lost in the torrent of negative.

With each insult Rei's lip quivered slightly, she didn't think she was being affected in any way but her body language spoke a different story.

Rei tilted her head down, her blue hair covering her eyes. "Stop......" Even being as tall as she was the comment was either not heard or ignored by the crowd. Stubbornly Shinji kept pushing Rei, his hands now only reaching her waist and his eyes were level with....her crotch.

Rei heard a cracking noise and suddenly her head felt like she'd been shot, like someone took a hammer and started hitting it repeatedly. "Stop just stop!" Breaking her stoic expression Rei looked genuinely sad, her red eyes looked as if they belonged to a tormented child.

"Stop!" Pulling an arm back Rei, now 16 and a half feet tall, swung her arm against the crowd. The action acting like a weight lifter had punched each of them in the spot they were hit. One by one all in the group fell down against Rei's arm, a single loss of control stopped every single person here and her growth still continued.

Regaining her composure the giantess looked around to everyone, all their eyes were filled with a mixture of hatred and fear. Although their lips were still Rei kept hearing the insults they were muttering moments ago.

Appearing distant Rei looked down, she was now twenty feet tall and Shinji was still pathetically attempting to get Rei away from the group of people, even though he now only reached her knee cap. Turning her gaze back to the crowd Rei muttered one sentence, a sentence that showed just what kind of a giantess she would be.

"Please, don't make me do that again. I don't wish to cause harm to any of you." Rei said as she regained her composure.

The crowd of people around her seemed to be hesitant to trust the giant girl, but they slowly began to back off. Maybe Rei's words had convinced them that she truly didn't mean them any harm, but it was more likely that they were simply to scared of her to stick around. After seeing what Rei was capable of, they obviously didn't want to get on her bad side. Seeing the crowd around her beginning to disperse, Rei breathed a sigh of relief.

With everyone having left, Rei looked down and finally noticed Shinji straining himself to push against her leg. Seeing him so small compared to her, putting all of his strength into trying to move her massive body, Rei couldn't help but smile. The way that he was trying so hard in spite of being much to small and weak to ever hope to succeed was really quite cute. Rei could tell that Shinji truly wanted to get her away from the people who were ridiculing her, to protect her from their cruelty. It really was quite touching how much he seemed to care for her.

"Let's go, Shinji." Rei said, her emotionless tone of voice hiding how happy she really was.

"R-right..." Shinji replied, still somewhat nervous around the now-gigantic 1st child.

The two then began to walk back to NERV headquarters, knowing that it was the only place that they could go without having to worry about Rei's new size terrifying the citizens. By this time, Rei had grown another 5 feet, reaching a stunning 25 feet tall. With how big she had become, it took Shinji a lot of effort just to keep up with Rei's massive strides. After walking for a while, Shinji began to get tired out. Seeing this, Rei reached down and scooped the small boy up in her arms to carry him.

At first Shinji was shocked by this action and began to struggle to be put down, but then he looked up and saw Rei's tender smile beaming down at him, and he finally began to relax. In fact, as Rei continued holding the tiny boy in her arms, Shinji actually began to enjoy his situation. He could feel the gentle warmth of Rei's body heat all around him, and her heartbeat echoed in his ears as she held his head up to her chest. It almost felt as if he was a baby being cradled in the arms of his own mother once again. Eventually Rei's calming heartbeat lulled Shinji to sleep.

Holding his sleeping form in her arms as she walked, Rei smiled sweetly as she continued to walk toward their destination. As the towering girl walked through the city, several people looked up and saw the peaceful and caring look on her face as she cradled the sleeping Shinji in her arms. Seeing her like this, she truly did look like a mother caring for her child. It was such a serene sight, and it made some of the people reconsider their original opinions about the titanic girl. They could tell that, in spite of her intimidating size, she clearly wasn't the malicious beast that they initially thought her to be.

After a while, Rei finally arrived at her destination. Setting Shinji back down on the ground, she gently nudged him with her index finger to wake him up.

"Wake up, Shinji. We're here."

Slowly coming to his senses, Shinji looked up to see the massive Rei Ayanami staring down at him. At first he was shocked, wondering what was going on, but then he remembered what had happened earlier and calmed down a bit. It was still a bit odd to see his blue-haired teammate towering so far above him, but he knew that she would never hard him.

Nodding to each other silently, the two Eva pilots walked into NERV headquarters. Much to their surprise, they were immediately greeted by a familiar face. It was their fellow pilot Asuka Langley Soryu, and...

Rei was at a loss of what to do as she looked at the crying form of Shinji Ikari as he leaned into the front entrance of the melted entry plug of Unit 00 after their narrow victory over the 5th Angel. She just couldn't understand how her survival could move someone to tears of joy. Someone who she slapped in the face not to long ago in fact. Shouldn't he hate her for that? Then again she often struggled to understand many things about human behavior. After all she wasn't really human and The Commander made it clear that she was only allowed to interact with anyone no more then was absolutely necessary. She was a key component in his plans, but a replaceable one. A fact he had made clear to her for her entire life. So it just made no sense to her how her life could mean so much to someone who was little more the a stranger to her.

"I'm sorry. I don't really know what to do in situations like this." Rei said in her usual soft tone.

*Sniffle* "Maybe you could try smiling?" Shinji asked gently.

A rare expression of surprise went across her pretty face. But then it turned into an even more rare warm smile that made her even prettier. And the soft light of the full moon in the entry plug made her pale skin glow in a way made her seem otherworldly. Like an real Angel.

"You're so beautiful.." Shinji said in awe. But when he realized what he said his face turned completely red. "Uh..I-I didn't mean that..well I did but w-what I meant was you're smile is beautiful! N-not to say that the rest of you isn't because it totally is..No that's even worse..what I mean is-"

*Snort* *Giggle*

Shinji with awkward fumbling of his words was then graced with a sight and sound that no one, not his father had ever seen before.

Rei Ayanami laughing.

It was the most amazing thing he had ever seen or heard. And it was in that moment that Shinji had found somthing truly worth piloting The Eva for. Something that he would fight any Angel for, no matter how terrifying or powerful. Something that would inspire him to become as strong as possible to protect. Something that he would give anything to see and hear again. Her smile and her laugh.

And Rei,whether or not she realized it, also found something in that moment. Something she never imagined was possible. She found someone that she cared for more then The Commander. The man who she owed her entire existence to. Her sole purpose was to help him achieve his ultimate desire. And yet she would one day find herself willing to live for something, someone more. It was the moment where everything changed.

(3 weeks later)

Rei stood in front of her mirror in her filthy apartment with a puzzled look on her face. The cause of this was a B-cup bra that was too tight on her. It seem that she had a growth spurt.

Asuka had always prided herself on her top-notch physical well being. So much so it was little wonder why she would ace any swimming competition at her, Shinji, and Rei's (along the rest of their friends/companions) school.

Asuka's only real competition seem to be from Rei Ayanami, the almost constantly silent girl was a natural swimmer and the water seemed to love her just as much as it loved Asuka.

There wasn't a single event where the two didn't place First and Second (coincidence you decide). In the beginning Asuka was always the first to finish but slowly Rei began to take that from her. From that point onward the two were constantly switching victory positions, something that brought on a lot of fanfare from the school-body. But then the unthinkable occurred...

Asuka had placed fourth! It was inconceivable it was impossible it was true.

Hikari could only watch with concern as Asuka stormed off back into the locker-room. She knew her close friend was disappointed and knowing the redhead the way she knew her Asuka was in no mood to talk to anyone walking the face of the Earth.

Shinji and Rei as well watched their fellow comrade-in-arms and friend (or acquaintance to Rei) walk away no doubt disappointed with the outcome. Shinji being close to both girls wanted to go speak with Asuka until Rei stepped in.

"I sense now would not be the proper time to speak with Souryu. Doing so will only bring harm to your physical well-being, Ikari." she explained rather seriously. One thing about Rei she never pulled any punches the few times she spoke and was always straight to the point.

Shinji sighed before nodding, guess it would be smart to allow Asuka some time to herself...

Within the locker room Asuka screamed in pure unadulterated frustration. Her winning record, her image, her happiness, all tainted now by this one inexcusable loss. She growled, teeth clenched tight, before slamming the door to her locker shut the ear-shattering sound blasting throughout the entire room.

How could this have happen, how did she let herself lose this way. The loss to Ayanami wasn't even a bother to her now, the fact that she lost to Rei along with two others was what was driving her insane.

After changing into her casual attire, Asuka slammed her right fist into the bench build beside the lockers, lucky for her no blood was drawn. While still frustrated her anger was beginning to tire her out so she moved over to the nearby sink.

Asuka stood there for minutes on end, breathing in and out after she had applied some water to her flustered face. Staring upward at her reflection the redhead sighed her anger finally starting to calm down, though she was still in no mood for any sort of conversation.

But if there was one thing about Asuka that was constant outside of her short-temper it was her will to win, to prove her worth to everyone in and around her. Slowly a smirk began to form across her once frustrated lips. She would bounce back from this, even if she had to take some time off any upcoming competitions, she vowed to return better, faster, stronger then ever before.

Yes Asuka Langley Souryu would not let this loss stop her. No the second child would return to the water and make it bow before her might. This much she was certain of.

"Fine, whatever. But whatever you recommend better be good." she stated with a hint of arrogance.

Touji sighed silently, one thing's for sure this trip to the store was going to be one to remember.
12221.title: Asuka encounters Touji

choices: Asuka plays it safe and take a sip
Asuka drinks the entire bottle
122212.content:
'Man how does Shinji live with this girl...such a pain...' grumbled Touji mentality. Though he figured he might as well help her just so she'd be on her way.

Guiding the redhead, a bored look on her face as he watched her follow him through the aisles, to the location of an item that would perhaps help her out.

"Here we are. I think this would help." Touji grabbed the 24oz bottle and nearly stuffed it into Asuka's awaiting arms.

"The hell's this? I told it whatever you gave me had better be effective." she snapped angrily.

"And I told you one) that I'd help you if you'd calm down and two) it is useful. It's a new energy drink that acts like a protein shake. It's suppose to help built muscle mass but without the "nasty" taste of the usual shakes."

"So I just drink this and I'll pump up?" asked Asuka, curiosity still playing in her mind, surely it wasn't that simple...was it?

"Well not exactly...you still have to work out. Do a couple of squats, push-ups, joggling, that sort of thing. Then you'll see the results, the guys on the team tell me it's helped them out a bit."

"So stooge have you tried it, then?" Asuka asked, a bit of her usual personality resurfacing.

"What me? No way I'm as fit as can be!" explained the raven-haired boy doing his best to strike a powerful yet unfortunately goofy looking pose.

"Tch" shaking her head slightly Asuka had to admit while Touji was a pain in the ass to her many a time his best shot of trying to look "manly" did bring a laugh to her lips.

"Well whatever...thanks for the help." she mumbled the latter part in a quieter tone than usual before turning on heel and heading for the register, though before she did she noticed the larger versions of the drink that were also available.

Suddenly Touji's voice rang out, "Oh yeah I forgot to mention you're new at this sort of thing so be sure to follow the directions properly."

Asuka's right eye cringed slightly as she heard him, who was he to tell her how to use a drink of this sort? Did he really think she was some stupid child who couldn't follow the directions on a label?

"Yeah, yeah..." she mumbled back before walking off...

After paying for her purchase, Asuka walked out of the building and onto the streets. Turning a street corner she pulled out the bottle and gave the directions a once over.

Apparently one only had to take a short sip and do a minor workout to see results, though those results wouldn't exactly be major in any way. Asuka took that into consideration though a part of her wondered what would happen if you drank the whole thing then worked out?

Slowly she placed the bottle to her waiting lips...
122212.title: Touji's help is actually useful

choices: Ritsuko injects Asuka with a serum
Ritsuko hands Asuka a drink of sorts
12222.content:
Asuka figured it'd be best to head toward Nerv and speak with Dr. Akagi. The woman was the one in charge of research and development but also really did seem to play the role of "doctor" whenever she needed to.

If anyone at Nerv could help Asuka it was Akagi. A smile creep on her to her lips as she readjusted her walking route...

One bus trip later, the young redhead found herself within the walls of Nerv HQ. Even though today was a day off for the pilots it seemed the place as busy as usual, workers coming and going most paying no mind to Asuka others just nodding before walking off. The girl herself also did the same until at last she found the office of Ritsuko Akagi.

After a third knock the older woman's voice ringed out. "Come in, door's unlocked."

With that said Asuka did just that though was taken back by the blonde woman's sudden outburst.

"Misato if you're here to re invite me to go drinking with you tonight you can forget it I told you 'll be burning the midnight oil...'

Ritsuko cut short her words when she finally spun around in her chair to catch a glimpse of Asuka, who stood there with a raised eyebrow.

"Oh...it's you, Asuka. Here I thought it was your absent-minded guardian coming to bug me once again. Honestly this is a bit of surprise, what can I do for you?"

Asuka went on to explain her current situation but not before making a mental remark about Misato's social habits...

"I see...well I suppose I too would be disappointed in the outcome. Regardless I think I can help you...let me see if I have anything available." stated Ritsuko as she lifted herself off her seat and began to search cabinet after cabinet.
12222.title: Onward to Nerv

choices: Asuka gains a small amount of muscle
Asuka gains a huge/massive amount of muscle
122221.content:
As Ritsuko searched Asuka made herself comfortable by aligning her back with the right wall of the doctor's office. With a yawn Asuka wondered just what it was the good doctor was looking for.

"So what is it that you're looking for?" she asked.

"A little something that could help you..." Akagi stated just before coming across said item. She turn toward the younger girl and in her hand was a some sort of small case. Ritsuko then ordered Asuka to take a seat on her office chair to which the girl did as told though curiosity still rang in her mind.

"What is that, Doctor Akagi?"

Ritsuko didn't response instead popped open the case and Asuka caught a glimpse of vials housed within.

'The hell?' she wondered as Akagi loaded one of them into a syringe of a needle.

"Woah I was looking for way to get stronger not avoid the flu!" exclaimed the redhead as she felt like rushing out the door yet the older woman giggled at her shock.

"Now now, Asuka. This isn't like that. It's a stimulant" "A drug?!" Asuka's feeling of running out the door had just multiplied tenfold.

"It's not that type of drug....this will help you gain what you want."

This seem to calm Asuka and the doctor went on.

"This particular stimulant or serum if you will was design to increase Ayanami Rei's stamina and durability back when she was the only pilot available thus the strain of potentially combating multiple angels on her own wouldn't be a problem. Unfortunately it wasn't completed until long after you and Shinji were made pilots so it was pretty much useless and abandoned." explained Ritsuko.

"So this will actually help me?" "In theory yes it should?"

"Huh?" That last part hadn't exactly sat well with the redhead.

"What I mean is that it's never been tested before, as I told you, there was no need for the serum to be used on Rei since it was finalized way too late. This would mark the first ever testing. So are you still up to it?"

'Untested huh, not exactly what I expected but hell if it's going to help me then so be it.'

"Sure, go for it." Asuka stated confidentially.

"Alright but as I said it's untested so any discomfort should be expected though I know for certain it shall not kill you. Just trust me on that last part." she added as Asuka was a second away from commenting.

A minute later the serum had been injected into Asuka. For a moment the girl felt nothing in fact she felt rather normal and wondered if chemical had even done anything at all. Then another minute passed...
122221.title: Ritsuko's untested serum

choices: Help her.
Try to stop her.
1222212.content:
"Agh!" Asuka screamed, clutching her sides and doubling over.

"Asuka! I--...at least, I don't think it will kill you..." Ritsuko stammered, less certain than before.

Asuka's whole body then spasmed, drawing her up to stand upright, stiffly. Her eyes and hands clenched shut.

Ritsuko watched in horror as the veins all across Asuka's body became thick, strained, and startlingly visible. She panicked even more when she saw a grim look cross Asuka's face, and her lips parted, revealing her teeth, gritted tightly shut in a horrible look of...pain? Fear? Or...

"Hahhhh..." Asuka laughed through her teeth.

...happiness?

Ritsuko realized that the horrible look on Asuka's face was a strained, intense smile. Strangely, this just made Ritsuko more worried.

Finally, just when Asuka's veins looked about ready to explode out of her skin, there was a deep, tightening, organic sound...and Asuka's body suddenly erupted with muscles.

Her arms swelled up immensely, gaining shocking mass, and definition. So did the rest of her body. Her legs thickened to an impressive girth, and as she lifted her shirt up to take a look, sure enough, she had an imposing pair of abs.

Asuka clearly was admiring her body's developments, as she now resembled a female bodybuilder. But taking her eyes off her own form, she looked at Ritsuko.

"I'm not done yet." she smiled "I can feel it--OH!"

The strange muscle sound groaned again, louder, as she swelled up more...then, a third time, even louder, even longer, and finally she exhaled, apparently done.

Ritsuko's jaw dropped.

Asuka's sweaty, gleaming body was shocking. Her veiny, hard, shimmering biceps were big as basketballs. Her shoulders invited a similar comparison. Her legs were as thick as some trees. Her neck was far thicker than her head. Her pecs soared out from her chest majestically, putting any pair of conventional breasts to shame.

Asuka did not have a naturally large frame, and the serum did nothing to increase her height. This, paired with her tight, tight clothes all served to further impress upon one just how muscular and ripped and huge she was.

"Are...are you okay? Ritsuko asked, when she could finally talk.

"What do you think?" Asuka asked, playfully flexing her world-record-breaking body.

"Alright, I suppose that was a stupid question. But, I mean, you don't feel any negative side-effects of this...this growth of yours?"

"None at all. My only concern is, just how many more wonderful little vials of this stuff do you have?"

Ritsuko gulped. Clearly, Asuka, never one to be easily satisfied, looked at her amazing growth as merely step one, despite the fact she obviously put herself far ahead of Rei's, or anybody's, league. This...could get interesting. Should she go ahead and assist Asuka, or put her foot down before things got too out-of-hand?
1222212.title: Asuka's Great Growth Begins

choices: Inject Asuka with a second dosage
Time for Asuka to show off her new body
12222121.content:
Ritsuko thought over her options for a while, Asuka amazingly stood silent giving the older now much smaller woman more then enough time to reach a decision.

'A situation like this may never present itself again...could it be is it even possible for a human being to defeat an angel without the use of an Evangelion unit?'

Still waiting Asuka was now starting to get bored from the sudden silence but before she could lash out a compliant Ritsuko smiled in rather confident fashion. The smile seem to be rather infectious as Asuka found herself grinning as well.

"I believe we can be of assistance to one another, Asuka."

"How so?" questioned the buffed up redhead as she rested her hands on her wider harder waist.

"Simple I assist you in your continued growth...but you must do two things for me." stated Ritsuko.

"That being?" Ritsuko watched as Asuka titled her head to one side and rested it on the muscularity that made up her neck.

"One (raising a finger upward) I will always be in charge of your growth. Threaten me and I will find a way to either ensure you never get any more of the serum or I'll come up with an antidote and you can say goodbye to all your new strength."

Asuka huffed near silently at the first condition but for the moment put it aside she knew the doctor was smart enough to come up with a backup plan if given enough time and Asuka certainly didn't want to become powerless again.

"Two (this time two fingers raised) I want to be a part of one of if not THE greatest human achievement of our time."

Confused Asuka raised an eyebrow.

"I want to see if if it's possible to defeat an angel without the use of an Evangelion."

Ritsuko smiled as she walked up to Asuka, her mental grip on the newly formed amazon was nearly complete. It just needed that one last push and the doctor knew exactly what buttons to push in order to get her way.

"Think of it, Asuka. You are now in a league of your own as far as your competition is concerned but what if you could ascend even further? What if you could...destroy an angel with your own bare hands? Your Evangelion wouldn't be required only your own immense strength. Then and only then would you have no equal."

As she finished Ritsuko could nearly feel the warm satisfaction beaming off of Asuka's face. The hold was now complete.

"What do you say, Asuka?"

"What do I say? I'd have to be a damn fool to turn down such an offer." stated Asuka in the blink of an eye.

"I'll have ultimate power" she paused to flex to her right bicep, "and you'll have your achievement."

A smirked then played on Asuka's lips, "Of course I'll have a part of the fame and glory since you obviously can't do this without me. In any case I'm in."

The deal was set now the question was should Ritsuko give Asuka another shot here and now or does Asuka head off to showcase her new improved form?
12222121.title: Ritsuko forms a deal with Asuka

choices: Asuka grows to 50 feet in height more muscular than anyone
Asuka gains the ability to alter her bodysize
122221211.content:
Right at the moment where Asuka got injected, she fell to the ground in pain and started to grow. "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAAHAHAAHAHAHAH! I will be a goddess of this world!" Asuka yelled as she started to grow. She quickly doubled in size making her arms easily 100 inches she gained an eight-pack and her height increased to 12 feet.


"Inject another shot to me! NOW!" Asuka yelled taking all of the vials from Ritsuko and injecting all of them at once in herself.
122221211.title: Inject Asuka with a second dosage

choices: Ritsuko makes a move for the case
Asuka's anger triggers another growth spurt
12222122.content:
Ritsuko was somewhat intrigued by Asuka's question but the logical portion of her brain told her that even with science one shouldn't push what definitely did not need to be pushed. This was one of those cases, Asuka now had a body shape that would put even world-class athletes to shame and the girl wanted even more! No she had to take control of the situation before something way too drastic occurred.

"I'm sorry Asuka but one is all you get. After all you now have what you were seeking for, a muscular build that guarantees success against any and all opponents. Do you really need anymore then you already have?"

Ritsuko eyed the buffed up redhead, while she was older then Asuka the younger girl's new amount of muscle did worry the doctor slightly.

Akagi flinched slightly as Asuka raised a finger Ritsuko's eyes hinted at fear for a split-second before Asuka smirked at the older woman.

"I don't think you heard me right, doctor. I didn't ask for you to give me another injection I asked just how many are left."

Asuka's lips parted slightly to reveal her pearly white teeth as her smirk grew in size, "You see I'll be taking all of them with me and I'll use every last one to make myself even bigger. I'll make sure that I am forever unstoppable and unbeatable."

That last part really worried Ritsuko, if one vial made Asuka as big as she currently was she could only imagine how large the girl would become if she used them all. Instinctively she took a step back as Asuka took a step forward, the blonde woman could hear the cracking of the pavement underneath Asuka's heavy footstep.

"So are you going to give them to me or what?" Asuka took another step forward, and Akagi took another step back.

"I...I told you that you can not have them." Ritsuko stated with a slight gulp as she took a hold of the small case housing what Asuka wanted and wanted badly, in retrospect Ritsuko wasn't sure if it was such a smart move considering the situation.

Asuka's smiled faded as she surprised the doctor as well as herself with her speed as her right fist came crashing into the wall behind Akagi making quite a dent in the process.

"You're starting to push my nerves, doctor. Now give me the case. I won't ask again!" the muscular redhead demanded with a growl.

Frighten as she was Ritsuko stood firm against Asuka's overwhelming intimidation.

Asuka's eyes squinted her blue eyes nearly shut as her smirked from before had completely faded away and was now replaced with an expression of rage and anger.

Twisting away with her iron fist at the gravel that made up the wall's surface, Asuka balled her up her left hand, the blood veins residing within pulsing outward.

"You don't get it do you! I'm taking what's mine regardless of how you or anyone else feels!"

As the now angered redhead stared her down, Ritsuko came to realize that Asuka's increasing anger must be a side-effect of the serum. Even though the girl was already known to have a short fuse the chemical formula had to be working in tune with her already establish anger and intensify it to even greater amounts.

"Asuka please you must calm yourself. The serum...I fear that it's affecting your anger and making you unstable!" shouted Ritsuko but the warning came too little to late as Asuka swatted away the doctor, lucky for her it wasn't enough to severely injure and or kill her in the process.

But to Ritsuko's dismay the case flew out of her hands and went skidding across the floor to the other side of the room. A lucky break for the doctor and another angering moment for Asuka who cursed in frustration.
12222122.title: No means no

choices: Run!
Grow!
122221221.content:
Ritsuko, immediately, running completely on instinct, made a mad dash for the case. Asuka, who was too busy shouting, and stamping her foot angrily for a moment (and causing alarming cracks on the floor while doing so) missed her chance, as Ristuko once again grabbed the case.

Things were getting...scary. In the interest of self-preservation, handing the case over would probably be the wisest thing. But she'd already made up her mind, and wasn't going to cave in just because Asuka was being even more of an impatient, selfish brat that usual, thought Ritsuko angrily.

And really, the thought of Asuka taking more of the substance scared the hell out of Ritsuko. Because, well, there was no telling what would happen. Even if each vial added the same amount of burgeoning muscle to her, Asuka would still end up a hulking superwoman. And, even worse...what if the effects grew more potent with each use? It was possible, for all Ritsuko knew. And if so, by the end of it, she could be a damn mountain of rippling, unstoppable muscle.

No, Ritsuko had to nip this madness in the bud. But...how? Asuka was already eying her and the case venomously, and would probably pounce soon. The way Ritsuko saw it, trying to reason with Asuka already proved pointless, so she could either try running away with the case (dangerous, considering Asuka's speed, but still...it COULD work).

Or...well, it was crazy, but she could try injecting herself. That would be one way of putting Asuka in her place. Sure, Asuka could make a grab for the vials while Ritsuko was incapacitated by her own growth, but it was still a maneuver worth considering. Besides, she doubted that Asuka would want to just try injecting herself again without some form of proper guidance.
122221221.title: Run or Grow

choices: Asuka catches up with Ritsuko
Ritsuko surprisingly runs into Rei
1222212211.content:
Ritsuko glanced at the case in her arms and wondered if injecting herself with the same serum she did Asuka would give her the edge needed to calm the raging redhead.

As tempting as it was the doctor knew she ran the risk of losing herself to the formula's side-effects much like Asuka has and while it was even more risky Ritsuko decided to make a break for the door. Akagi figured if she could get away from Asuka long enough she could use her brains over the girl's muscle...but the hard part was getting away safe and sound.

With a deep breath she leaped to her feet and urged her feet to use all of her natural given speed to run straight out the door.

Asuka gave one final stomp forward before noticing the blonde woman try to make her leave.

"Oh no you don't!" shouted the muscle bound girl giving quick chase. But once again luck would be on Akagi's side as she made it to the door before mumbling a quick apology and slamming it straight into her pursuer's face.

The door wasn't iron-clad or anything close to the sort but the force behind it along with the sudden impact was enough to stun Asuka even if it was for less than a second tops.

The doctor knew she wasn't out of the fire yet and continued running just as she heard the blasting sound of Asuka's heavy fist tearing through her office door. A moment later Asuka had effectively ripped the door off it's hinges and tossed it away as if it was a plush toy.

Smashing her fist into the wall to the right of her, Asuka sneered in frustration as she believed Ritsuko had gotten clean away. That is until she saw a glance of the doctor's lab coat just as the woman turned the corner at the end of the long and rather lengthy hallway.

Her expression soften into more of a smirk and Asuka knew the hunt was back on. It was time to claim her prize.
1222212211.title: Get out while you still can!

choices: Asuka's second growth begins...
12222122111.content:
As Asuka leaped after Ritsuko, she came to terms with the fact that all her new strength, sprung up and ready to use in her huge, bulging muscles, would take some getting used to. For as she approached the corner that Ritsuko turned at, the immense young redhead overshot it, and embarassingly slammed into the wall, denting it, and dazing herself.


As she rubbed her now door-slammed and wall-smashed head, a certain red mist seemed to clear from Asuka's mind, and she strangely found herself lifted of some of her previous rage, and her drug-induced anger seemed to mellow. So it was that a calmer, more collected Asuka resumed the chase for the Ritsuko. This simultaneously made her less likely to hurt Ritsuko, but with her mind once again running at full capacity, it also meant that she was all the more likely to get what she wanted.

And so it was that Ritsuko, who was beginning to feel relieved, thinking she now had a good chance of escaping Asuka, was crestfallen to feel a breeze as Asuka, now coming to terms with her physical capabilites already, swept past her, and skidded to a stop, causing visible scrapes across the tile floor with her now-bare feet.

"Ritsuko." Asuka began, the very picture of charm, as she stood up straight and composed herself "We're both being silly. For my part, it was awful of me to hit you like that. I'm just glad you didn't get hurt. You ARE okay, right?"

"Yes..."

"I'm so glad! But at the same time...well, you have to understand that you can't outrun me. I promise, I'm never going to hurt you again. But it's certainly within my power to keep you restrained until you give me what I want. Visitors are none too frequent to this neck of the woods, and I'll make sure that you don't contact anyone for help. So you can either spend hours with my hand on your shoulder, before finally giving up, or you can go ahead, save us both some time and irritation, and give me what I want now...because you have to agree, ma'am, I am nowhere near big or strong enough yet! I'm a twig!"

She flexed her enormous body, smiling ironically.

"Before this day is over..." she continued "...I will be a damn goddess. Isn't that an invigorating thought?"

Ritsuko gulped. The dead end had officially been reached. Asuka was right, with the situation they were in, her only hope would be for someone to come by, and that could take hours, or even days. And even then, what IF someone came by? Asuka could probably just sweep them up in her little drama, too.

At least Asuka seemed to be telling the truth about her anger issues calming down...her swollen muscles seemed to be more relaxed, and her smile now had a menacing streak of a different sort, and not the 'I MIGHT KILL YOU' kind. An improvement, anyway.

Ritsuko had tried her hardest, but it was true. Any struggle past this point would be silly and fruitless.

"Alright, Asuka. You win."

And with that, Ritsuko prepared the next vial, and plunging it (now, with some difficulty) into one of Asuka's thick veins, she injected it.

Ritsuko crossed her fingers.
12222122111.title: Asuka Wins

choices: Success Ritsuko injects Rei with the serum!
Uh oh Asuka pounced upon the two of them!
12222122112.content:
It was rare but for the first time in who knows how long Ritsuko's mind was blur and the only thought coursing her very being was getting the hell away from the rampaging redhead...

Because of this however the good doctor failed to notice the direction she was headed towards, or rather to be more precise the certain individual who ironically had a checkup set for today.

Ritsuko grunted in pain as she felt the air within her leave rather sharply after making direct contact with the approaching individual, who from their own gasp of lost breath was also of the female gender.

Lifting herself as quick as they could the stranger offered Ritsuko a hand up as well. It was then she took notice of person standing before her, none other than Rei Ayanami.

The blue-haired girl blinked before releasing her hold on the doctor's hand, confident that the older woman could stand on her own two feet and that no physical harm had come to either of them.

Just as Ritsuko was going to thank Rei she, along with the younger girl, heard the breaking of the floor below them as Asuka was getting ever closer.

Rei said nothing as she felt the ground begin to shake in large tremor-like fashion, a part of wondering what was the cause behind it. An Angel attack, perhaps? No she and the others would have already been informed of such a state of emergency. Rei stood silent as she went over any possible scenarios but what she would see next would surprise even her the constantly silent pilot.

Asuka suddenly turned the same corner that Ritsuko had come from and stood there in her hulking form with what appeared to be a grin of satisfaction.

"Found you!" she stated as she stared directly at the blonde doctor.

Ritsuko gasped, desperation and panic beginning to fill her insides for she knew this time Asuka would waste no time going through her to get the vial-filled case.

Then it hit her, like a light bulb going off inside her head, Rei was right beside her. Looking down at the case Ritsuko began to quickly formulate a plan. She had to not only think fast but move fast if this was going to work.

'As a side-effect the serum seem to intensify Asuka's anger but with the way Rei was raised she has never felt anger in her life before thus she would be able to stay in control of her emotions...or lack there of even if I...'

Ritsuko thoughts were cut short as Asuka began to stomp forward. Almost instinctively as if she knew of the incoming threat and without even being told to do so Rei set herself up in front of Ritsuko.

With Rei blocking a bit of Asuka's view Ritsuko knew this was the moment of truth. Carefully she opened the case and expertly set up the needle with the vial of serum.

Once again she held her breath and made her move.
12222122112.title: Ritsuko surprisingly runs into Rei

choices: ...ended up growing as big as Asuka.
...grew much more muscular.
122221221121.content:
"Rei, this might hurt!" Ritsuko warned, a split-second before jabbing the needle into her from behind.

"Yeah, it will!" Asuka shouted savagely, thinking the doctor was referring to the pounding she was going to deliver onto both of them.

But Asuka soon knew better, as she heard Rei take a sharp inhalation of breath as the needle delivered its payload into her. The effects were immediate. Asuka, caught off guard by this development, froze. And so both Asuka and Ritsuko, cat and mouse, watched as Rei went through the whole painful, horrifying performance that Asuka had been through. And when the muscle growth and swelling began its dramatic process, Rei...
122221221121.title: Rei's Changes Begin

choices: ...Asuka, some chemical reaction stirred by her emotions, grows!
...Rei turns to Ritsuko, and calmly demands more of the vials!
1222212211212.content:
With a stretching, straining noise, Rei's formerly lithe, thin muscles exploded into massive, veiny, pulsating slabs. She immediately was bigger than Asuka, and a second, slighter growth put her well past the redhead's league. Though impressed by her own growth, she observed and felt her knew body coldly and logically. Her calm, serene face looked severely out-of-place, framed as it was by massively swollen neck muscles that reached up to her ears. Her biceps were enormous, bloated, bigger than watermelons, laced with tense veins. Her pecs put Asuka's to absolute shame. Her legs were each thicker than Asuka's entire body.

And Asuka, for her part, was livid.

"Those muscles should be MINE!" she roared, diving towards Rei angirly. Rei, though, almost casually, swatted Asuka away with a massive arm, sending her to collide heavily with the wall. Asuka was now as outclassed by Rei, as Ritsuko was outclassed by Asuka.

"Dammit..." Asuka cursed, tears welling up in her eyes. After all this, all she did was put Rei even farther ahead of her. And with Rei now guarding Ritsuko and the vials, Asuka had no hopes of catching up. And now, it wasn't even like she could catch up to Rei by training the old-fashioned way...Rei was now her better, forever.

As Asuka held her world-class pity party, Ritsuko breathed a sigh of relief. It was, however, premature, as...
1222212211212.title: Rei > Asuka

choices: ...she inject Asuka with a second dose.
...something goes wrong for Asuka, but right for the other two.
12222122112121.content:
Asuka's tears stopped short as she felt a strange warmth welling up inside her.

"What the hell?" she asked herself. She was starting to sweat, and she looked down to see that her whole body was blushing red. And then...she felt it. And soon after, saw it. She was growing. But differently, this time...rather than the abrupt, painful growth of before, she could see and feel her muscles rise slowly, her whole body filling up with muscle like air being let into a balloon. A wicked smile crossed her face. She closed her eyes, tight, concentrating, trying to grab onto this development, not let it go. And YES! It was working! The pace quickened! This new growth was no doubt brought on by her emotions, but now she was carrying it on through sheer force of will. She was actually willing herself bigger, stronger, thicker! Her body reddened even more, sweat pouring across her body. And finally, the growth eased to a stop, and she let out a satisfied sigh as her blush faded. She was almost scared to open her eyes...the growth felt amazing and huge, but she was worried that she'd look to see that she still hadn't outgrown Rei. But, hah...she needn't worry after all. She opened her eyes to see Rei looking at her, intimidated in spite of her usual emotionless state of mind. And Ritsuko was hyperventilating in fear. And who could blame them? Asuka observed her body as much as she could, using the shiny, reflective tiles on the floor to help her.

Her muscles piled up all around her head, so much so that looking left or right only greeted her eyes with sights of her own muscles. Her frame of vision was partially blocked by her gigantic pecs, which extended whole feet ahead of her. Her arms, observing them as best she could, were so laden with muscle that they blew her mind. As she flexed, she burst out laughing as she realized the peak of each bicep extended past the top of her head.

Ritsuko considered injecting Rei again, but that would only serve to raise the stake and escalate this conflict. Asuka could well have another growth spurt...it was possible her metabolism had changed enough to produce something akin to the substance.

Furthermore, Rei was at risk now, too. And since she had quite a vested interest in Rei, for a number of reasons, she didn't want her to get hurt just because she, Ritsuko, didn't want to give in to Asuka. And it was comical how, as big as Rei was, Asuka now dwarfed her so completely.

"Fine, Asuka. You're right. You win. But I want you to know, you're a bully, and a brat."

"I disagree. I just...like being the best. And thanks to you, I can be just that. So...hit me with the good stuff."

As Ritsuko slowly pressed the needle into one of the engorged veins on Asuka's swollen muscles, she felt like she might faint. The thought of just how big she'd get now was terrifying, and her stomach felt like it was shriveled up into a ball. The only silver lining was an interesting observation: her flesh was so thick and hardened by muscle, that the needle had a hard time even piercing Asuka's skin. While this was scary on one level, it at least gave Ritsuko one small silver lining: after this, it was almost guaranteed that Asuka would become too tough to even be able to inject again. Still, small comfort. There was no telling how huge she'd get with this next hit, and knowing Asuka, she'd probably either figure out some way around that catch, or threaten Ritsuko until SHE came up with something. Ritsuko had a hard time imagining a future where Asuka didn't grow into an enormous mountain of muscle.

"I'm waiting." sang Asuka cheerfully.

Ritsuko sighed, and finally pushed the substance out through the needle, and into Asuka.

The effects were, as always, dramatic. All her huge muscles flexed to their massive full size (Ritsuko found herself wondering how they could even manage to GET any bigger), and began to strain against her skin. Her veins became further engorged, pressing out painfully in clear outlines. Then, in a strange spectacle, her muscles all seemed to shake and twitch, her whole gigantic body vibrating and spasming.

Finally, a roar erupted from Asuka's lips.
"YEEEESSSS! THIS IS IT~!"

And so it was. Her body exploded with muscle. Huge, heaving, hulking musculature piled impossible on her small frame, she had quickly doubled in size.

Her beautiful, mad face, breathing hard and sweating, was growing obscured by her enormous pecs, and her swelling neck and shoulder muscles. It was reaching the point where her head was starting to look like it was staring out from a jungle of flesh.

"Do you think I'm big?" she asked, smiling viciously "This is small! THIS IS SMALL!"

Another expansion jolted her, blowing her muscles up to the point where she had corked the hallway, muscles bunching up against the ceiling and walls. Every surface was buckling away from her impossible body.

"Run Ritsuko. THIS PLACE IS COMING DOWN! I'M FILLING IT ALL! GET TO SAFETY! BECAUSE, OH, I STILL NEED YOU! An ant like you couldn't imagine what this feels like...I need more! So much more!"

Ritsuko, wasting no time, did as the growing wall of muscle asked, and began to flee, Rei following her lead. Dammit! She was expecting Asuka to get big, but this!...how far would this second dose take her? She should have injected Rei again, when she had a chance.

Looking back, she saw that the hallway around Asuka had begun to collapse. The thought that tons of falling architecture would hurt the newly-armored-in-muscle Asuka didn't even occur to Ritsuko. The list of things which would hurt Asuka now was probably getting pretty short.

"This is insane!" whined Ritsuko to the world at large as she kept on running.

Rei was inclined to agree.

Finally, the two of them reached a vast room with a high ceiling, and a wall-spanning window overlooking the geofront. Figuring this was as good a place as any to stop, Ritsuko collapsed, panting. Rei, pumped as she was, hadn't even strained herself during the long run.

Ritsuko then considered the possibility that this could be time for a turnaround. Asuka, regardless of how ungodly her strength must be, would still need some time to reach them at this point. And Ritsuko still had some vials...could she buff Rei up enough to contend with the red head? The immediate effects of the substance seemed to be greater for Rei, but Asuka's anger and ambition seemed to fuel on a greater ultimate growth, at least so far. Or...
Ritsuko found herself going back to her previous thought from awhile ago: inject herself. The effects seemed to vary from person to person, and maybe it could do more for her than for Rei, since emotions were a powerful ingredient, and Rei had very little on that front. Plus, she had to admit that pure self-preservation compelled her to want some extra muscle for self-defense...BUT, the risk from before was still there. She had more self-control and a better temper than Asuka, but it could still drive her half-crazy, too. Did she want to risk it?

12222122112121122.content:
Sharp, quick breaths echoed out of Ritsuko's open mouth as she collapsed down onto her hands and knees on the floor. Sweat beaded on her skin like rain as she shook. "Aaaah, god! Here it comes!" She shouted as loud as she could.

It was like a pop. One second there was a woman on her hands and knees on the floor. The next second, there was a mountain of flesh that caused even Rei's formidable body to step backwards. Deep, throaty grunts rang out from somewhere underneath the mountains of muscle that Ritsuko had become, and as convulsions ripped through her body, there was plainly still more to come.

Panting, Ritsuko pushed herself back onto her knees, her blonde hair soaked with sweat leaving a sparkling trail as it flapped back. Even though she knew in her mind that this was only the beginning, her eyes couldn't help but rove over her body. Legs like trees, the sharp chords of her muscles writhing in her skin like pythons preparing to strike. Titanic pectoral muscles rested in front of her, stretching out like a shelf. And her arms, well. There weren't any words that could describe them. There was probably more muscle on one of her arms alone than both of Rei's legs put together. Even her trained, scientific mind couldn't begin to estimate how much power she was capable of exerting now.

For a few moments, the only sound echoing through the room was Ritsuko's deep breathing. Both her and Rei could only stand entranced, looking at Ritsuko's new body.

Finally, the silence broke. A chuckle was the culprit, coming from Ritsuko. "Well, there's more where that came from." She stated with a confidence that made Rei take another few steps backwards.

And as per usual, the Doctor was quite right. Only seconds later, an earthshaking howl escaped Ritsuko's lips as she doubled over again. Like a flowing tide, flesh shot outwards at a rate that could only be called ridiculous. Rather than a simple pop, this time the growth was much more gradual. Muscle oozed outwards, growing thicker and thicker. But as it did, something that neither Rei nor Ritsuko expected happened. Gradually, and at a much slower rate than her muscles, the rest of her body began to expand. It was a slow process, but her feet crept across the floor, slowly growing farther and farther away from her head. At the same time, her rippling back climbed higher and higher, growing closer to the ceiling. Her arms pumped larger and larger, longer and longer. With an errant spasm, one of them shot out, the limb that was easily longer than a car and probably just as thick striking the glass and shattering it like it wasn't even there.

After just a few more moments, the expansion was over. Titanic, Humongous, Gigantic. These words and more floated through Ritsuko's mind, but none of them did her justice. If she had stayed the same height as before, her muscles would have been so thick, so huge that even her form from just a few minutes ago would have looked like a stick figure. But she hadn't stayed the same height as before. She was now easily 30 feet tall, and filled up a good half of the room even while on her hands and knees. Under her, Rei looked up at her face, which was settled in a valley of muscle, in awe. A smile swept onto Ritsuko's face. She knew that she was losing it. She knew that she was turning out just like Asuka had. But she didn't care.

"And I'm not done yet!" Ritsuko laughed, her voice booming.

"Oh, but neither am I!" Another, familiar voice replied. But this voice seemed to shake the very air itself. Surprised, Ritsuko's pushed herself back onto her knees and looked out the window, moving her body to keep it from obstructing her view. What she saw shocked her.

Asuka.

That's all that Ritsuko could see. The entire window was full of Asuka. Dominating the center was a gigantic, red haired head, easily as tall as Ritsuko's whole body was, if not more. And other than that, literal mountains of muscle, extending as far as Ritsuko could see in all directions. If Ritsuko was indescribable, Asuka was unspeakable. Even if the two had been the same size, she still would have made Ritsuko look small in comparison.

"But this is only the beginning, my dear Doctor. Now I'll have you come along with me. After all, I've still got plenty of uses for you." Asuka laughed as her gigantic head, plastered with a "Cat that ate the canary" smile pulled back, and in it's place a titanic arm that would make a Sequoia tree feel small thrust a giant hand through the metal and glass that made up the wall as if it wasn't even there.

``It's time to stop Asuka´´ She said

A bodybuilding competition.
