They looked where they had last see Asuka what she wasn't anywhere.

``Where would she go?´´ Risuko said.

Meanwhile Asuka was walking through the NERVE base, with a proud grin in her face, her destination was...
122221221121212212.title: Asuka wasn't anywhere

choices: Asuka finds a key to a freezer filled with serum vials!
Check up on Ritsuko who's following Rei back to the lab
1222212211212122121.content:
Asuka chuckled as her footsteps thundered through the hallway. The German amazon was no fool she had seen Ritsuko and Rei make haste while she admired her new even more powerful form.

What she didn't know was that the two women had already juiced up on the serum still in Ritsuko's possession yet even if she did in fact know it would be irrelevant since Asuka already taking literal steps to ensure her dominance.

The lab wasn't far and while the other two had left her to her vices Asuka had decided it was time to stop chasing after Ritsuko and look for more of the special serum on her own. She didn't want to believe that Akagi was currently carrying all of the available amount, no there had to be more stashed away somewhere.

And Nerv's personal lab stations had to be just that place.

It didn't take took long for Asuka to retrace her steps back to Ritsuko's personal station. A major clue being what was left of the door still laying on the side of the hall. She recalled tossing it away as if it were made of plastic. She chuckled yet again before entering the room with a bit more difficulty then last time. Flexing her shoulders she squeezed herself in the hard (not that she felt any pain) way.

"Now Ritsuko...where are you keeping it?" Asuka muttered while scanning over the room.
1222212211212122121.title: The lab to get more serum.

choices: Asuka the Muscle Goddess!
Ritsuko and Rei find Asuka, but its too late!
12222122112121221211.content:
Asuka glanced around for a few minutes before spotting a set of keys on the desk. She remembered that those were the keys that the Doctor used to open up a cabinet filled with the serum. She picked up the keys and gingerly moved towards the back where a small freezer was located. Asuka tried a few keys before finding the right one and turned the key. She carefully opened the freezer and to her amazement, there it was, filled with tubes of serum just waiting to be gulped down.

"This is it! Just you wait, I'll be a goddess before today is over!"

Asuka decided to grab the whole freezer (because she could) along with a few more items like a bucket and a plastic bendable pipe and walked swiftly away leaving a decent more bit of damage than when she came in.

She didn't want to chance another encounter with Ritsuko so she decided to get away from NERV and head towards the outskirts where she could grow gigantic in peace. She decided the lake was probably the best place to be and the redhead took off in that direction getting several stares as she took off.

Meanwhile, Ritsuko and Rei were searching around in NERV for any sign of Asuka. Funny, trying to find a hulking redhead in a place this big should have been easy.

"Where is she? Do you think she could have gone outside?"

The two of them tried going outside and walked towards the beach to see if Asuka had gone outside to show off or something. All the while Ritsuko tried to think of all possible places that Asuka could have gone. Then it hit her, well, for someone like her that would have taken a lot but you get the idea.

"Wait sec, don't tell me she...."

She ran back to the labs and to her horror, she found that Asuka had indeed grabbed not just one more vial of serum, but the entire freezer!

"Asuka!" Ritsuko shouted and ran back out.

At the same time the said redhead prepared for her transformation into a muscle goddess. Asuka poured all the serum into a large plastic bucket and then stuck one end of the plastic tube into the serum and the other into her mouth and began to suck on it like a giant straw. After the first few gulps of serum, she began to feel its effects....
12222122112121221211.title: Asuka finds a key to a freezer filled with seru...

choices: Asuka ends up about seven feet tall and massively muscled
Asuka ends up beyond gigantic!  She's at least the size of building!
122221221121212212112.content:
Savoring the gulps of serum as they poured down her gullet, Asuka could already feel their effects. Pounds upon pounds of muscle were being added to her already immense frame, bulging out in every direction and nearly obscuring her head. Strangely enough, to accommodate all of this new muscle, her body began to slowly increase in height as well, rendering the fanatical German girl's surroundings smaller and smaller by the second. It was a sight that she wasn't expecting, but one that was readily welcomed.

A short distance, Ritsuko began running as fast as her new legs could take her with Rei following behind. They had to find Asuka before she could follow through on her insane ambitions. Yes, the two of them together would be more than enough to stop her psychotic ambitions.

That was until they found a small clearing by the lake and heard the sound of slurping.

"Ahh, delicious!"

Running forward, Ritsuko had the worst of her fears confirmed. In the clearing was an empty freezer, a bucket, a plastic tube, not one drop of the serum, and a gigantic and still growing Asuka!

"Ah, you two are just in time!" Asuka bellowed, laughing haughtily at the two smaller women as her body continued to increase in size and sheer muscular density. "You're about to see what a true goddess looks like!"

"Not if I can help it!" Ritsuko shouted, rushing forward and delivering a punch with enough force behind it to break an iron bar. Unfortunately for Ritsuko, her target wasn't iron, it was the increasingly dense muscles of the laughing redhead, who merely shrugged off the blow from her smaller opponent like it was a breeze.

"You shouldn't interrupt," Askua replied, the contempt in her voice audible as she pushed Ritsuko away with a free hand. "You can massage me with those weak muscles of yours AFTER I'm done growing."

After seeing Ritsuko so easily dispatched, Rei could only stand and watch as Asuka's body continued to pack on size and muscle, the naked red haired pilot laughing all the while.

"Doctor, what should we do?" Rei asked. Ritsuko could only stare slackjawed.

"I...I don't know."
122221221121212212112.title: Just in time for the ascension

choices: An Angel appears!
She grows even more huge!
1222212211212122121122.content:
The two women could only watch in horror and back away as Asuka continued to pump up towards the sky.

“HAHAHA! THIS FEELS SO AMAZING!!!” Asuka screamed as her body inflated with mythical sizes muscles. Her height began increasing as did her width to accommodate the immense amount of girl-beef. Within a few minutes, Asuka had doubled in size and was over two stories tall and at least twice as wide. Asuka felt the growth stop and she almost threw a tantrum as she wanted more.

Of course, the growth was just getting started. Again she felt that burning sensation across her body and more stretching and gurgling sounds were heard and her body inflated with even more muscle. Asuka didn't care that she was becoming so bloated with muscle, after all, who could stop her? Muscles piled everywhere filling up every available inch of space and every nook and cranny. She retained a relatively small waist giving her a ridiculous looking hourglass figure. She couldn't see of course and was only laughing manically as more and more strength and power continued to pump into her ever hungry, greedy body.

“Doctor? I think its best we clear out of this area,” Rei said as she noticed that the growth was starting to pick up pace.

“I think you're right, RUN!”

The two huge women began to run back down the hill not wanting to look at what kind of muscle monster Asuka was growing into. Doctor Akagi almost lost all hope of trying to stop Asuka. Every time she felt that Asuka couldn't physically pack on more muscle, her body always seemed to defy that notion. The two kept running for several more minutes until they reached the edge of the city. When they turned around finally, they could see a growing mass of flesh in the distance that was Asuka.

“Feast your eyes on a true MUSCLE GODDESS!” Asuka screamed out to no one in particular as her body continued to grow to the size of a large building.

Little did Asuka know, something was about to happen to her....
1222212211212122121122.title: Asuka the Muscle Goddess!

choices: Asuka, still growing, attacks the Angel directly!
Her body stops growing, forcing Asuka to run for it
12222122112121221211221.content:
Asuka laughed as she continued to feel her body engorge and expand to ever greater proportions. The only thing she was missing was an appropriately scaled glass building to view her reflection in so that she could completely take in her new size. Deciding to rectify that immediately, the monstrous girl began stomping her way towards the city, her powerful footsteps causing anything nearby to fly into the air. Before she knew it, she was in the city, the roads empty save for the cars that she would occasionally crush underfoot, the steel offering no resistance to her musclebound body.

"No one's here," she lamented aloud, having wished for an audience to her growth now that no one could interrupt it. Still, her ego was more interested in a building which caught her eye, with a clear glass sheen that would accurately reflect her body. Hurriedly, she ran towards it.

Unfortunately for her, the building soon shattered as she saw a creature hovering in the air, one that appeared alien and familiar all at once. It stood not on legs, but on thin air, a body of pure white with eyes over two large wing like flaps. Instead of arms, a large tail, multiple segments that attached and separated with claws on the edges, lashed out at buildings as it hovered over the city. Asuka could merely clench her fists, not feeling fear, but rather annoyance that something, anything would interrupt her stroking her ego.

**************************************************************************** *

"This keeps getting worse!" Ritsuko shouted, looking on in horror as the Angel stared down at the still smaller prey that was Asuka.

"But Dr. Itagki," Rei asked, "can't the Angel defeat Asuka? We have the means with which to neutralize the Angels, so if Asuka cannot defeat it, we can defeat the Angel ourselves and capture Asuka."

Such an idea seemed callous, yet Ritsuko nodded her head in agreement. "That would seem to be the wisest course of action. We need to get back to NERV and prepare Unit 00 for launch. Besides, not even all that muscle is a match for an Angel."

**************************************************************************** *

Oblivious to Ritsuko's plans to let muscle beast and angel battle to the finish, Asuka looked on at the powerful creature, cracking a grin across her billboard sized face.

"You don't look so tough," she taunted the creature as she went into a double bicep pose, the muscles across her body exploding in girth as the biceps rose above her head as blood rushed into them. "Pretty soon, I'll be big enough to crumple you inside my hand! That stupid little AT Field of yours won't be able to stop me!"

Neither made a move to attack the other as Asuka waited for her next growth spurt to kick in, the one that would allow her to battle the monster on equal, if not superior footing.
12222122112121221211221.title: Angel attack!

choices: The Angel starts to turn the battle around!
Ritsuko and Rei decide to help Asuka!
122221221121212212112211.content:
Asuka and the Angel continued to stare each other down for several minutes. Asuka wanted to settle this quickly so that she could go back to admiring her body. Though this opportunity was the perfect situation in which to test her new Goddess-sized muscles on.

She waited a little longer and sure enough she began to feel that burning sensation all over her body again. The serum was still working throughout her body and before long, Asuka could feel her muscles start inflating again. The sounds of organic stretching, gurgling and rumbling could be heard in a 300 foot radius as hundreds of pounds of muscle was being pumped into Asuka's body per second.

“HRURAGGGHHHHH!” Asuka roared as her body began swelling up again. With a single push of her super strong legs, she propelled her massive body through the street with an outstretched fist towards the Angel. With the strength of a dozen jets, she slammed her fist into the Angel trying to pierce its powerful force field.

At first the Angel didn't move, but as Asuka continued to pile muscle on her body, she pushed more and more and the Angel began to move backwards.

“HAHAHAHAHA!” Asuka screamed. She felt that nothing could stop her now, not even this Angel,

Meanwhile, Dr. Ritusko and Rei turn back and notice the colossal fight several miles away. The Angel was huge, even larger than Asuka right now. On one side, they wanted the Angel to try and teach Asuka a lesson even though it meant that they'd be in trouble but on the other hand, they were reluctantly grateful that Asuka could take on this thing all by herself.

The two continued to observe for a few minutes when suddenly....
122221221121212212112211.title: Asuka, still growing, attacks the Angel directly!

choices: Asuka is neutralized.  Unit 00, launch!
Asuka's growth kicks into overdrive, allowing her to turn the tide!
1222212211212122121122111.content:
The AT field held firm even as Asuka's powerful blows continued to drive the creature back. The monster proved unable to lash out at the constant assault though, unable to find an opening. Instead, it sat and waited, knowing the enemy would tire.

However, one powerful blow from the muscle goddess' bulging arm broke through the field, striking the Angel and knocking it to the ground with enough force that a huge dent was placed in its body. It was a sight Asuka found amusing to no end.

"HAHAHAHAHA! Is that all you've got?" she asked, flexing her enormous arms in front of the fallen creature. "You think these guns are bad now, just wait till I'm ten times bigger! A hundred times bigger! I'm going the most powerful thing on this entire planet! Not even the Angels are a challenge anymore!"

So caught up was Asuka in her taunting that she failed to notice the segments of the creature's tail behind her, claws on each segment outstretched rushing towards her. Before she could react, the claws dug into her muscles, the sharp talons still large enough to force a scream.

***********************************************************

The entirety of the incident was being viewed at the NERV control room. After a fair degree of difficulty, Rei was finally able to squeeze her enhanced body into the EVA plugsuit, and although a bit more cramped than usual, was ready to go. Still, the order to do so was not yet given.

"Is Soryhu neutralized Doctor?"

"Not yet," Ritsuko answered. But it appears even she's no match for an Angel.

"We cannot let the Angel run free. Soryhu is still needed."

"Agreed. You're going to have to save her, but not until the fight is completely out of her first. We can't risk Asuka running free and continuing to grow any more than we can a rampaging Angel. As soon as one is neutralized, you will launch and silence the other.

"Understood."

***************************************************************

The creature rose again as the claws separated themselves from her body, now joined together in a tail on the raised creature as it squeezed Asuka. Even her powerful muscles felt strained against such a large force.

"This can't hold me!" she shouted defiantly, but in response, she was soon silenced by a powerful jolt of electricity coursing through the tail and her, causing the muscle goddess to scream in agony. One shock became two, which became three, which became ten. And Asuka's muscles began to give way as the tail tightened around her.
1222212211212122121122111.title: An overconfident goddess

choices: Grew Even larger and Crushed the Angel!
12222122112121221211221112.content:
Asuka tried with all her vast strength to free herself from her bind, but surprisingly, no matter how hard she tried, she couldn't break free. The Angel's tail had weakened her significantly and the shocks caused her to lose focus. Asuka had to strain herself to stay conscious. She wanted to defeat the Angels all by herself. After all, it's what she trained for all her life. And now, with all these muscles and the strength of a whole army, she wasn't about to lose, not now. Not ever. She refused to lose.

From NERVs HQ, the heavily muscled Ritsuko and Rei were watching this. For a moment they felt that the Angel had defeated or at least disabled Asuka enough, and Rei got ready to launch the EVA00. As Rei ran through her systems check which was a bit difficult as there was little room for her to maneuver right now inside the cockpit as it was filled to capacity with sheer she-muscle. However, Rei wasn't given the order the launch as something was happening outside.

Back across town, the redhead's intense desire caused another reaction inside her body. She felt it again. Asuka grabbed hold of that power and willed her body to grow again. Her muscles started to inflate again, this time making them harder and denser than ever before. It was an intense rush of pain and pleasure again and Asuka's screams could be heard across the city as she willed her body to be stronger and stronger, larger and larger. She wanted to be the biggest, strongest being ever. Forget the Earth, she wanted to be the strongest being in the solar system! She wanted to be able to crush this Angel so that they may learn their lesson and never return again. She wanted to destroy the thing to the point where there wouldn't be any trace of it.

Larger and larger her muscles grew. Her body was getting taller and much wider, expanding to the size of several city blocks now. Her muscles had shattered the tail and Asuka was freed.

"I AM GOING TO RIP YOU APART!" she screamed and she grabbed hold of the Angel's main body, and with all her vast strength, started pulling the Angel apart at the seams. Asuka found it hard to pull apart even with her newly enhanced up body. Asuka....
12222122112121221211221112.title: Muscle Growth Mode Overdrive!

choices: Send Unit 00 and Unit 01 to neutralize Asuka
Send someone out to negotiate and see what she wants
122221221121212212112211121.content:
The Angel thrashed and bucked but could not free itself. The musclebound German girl, once smaller than it, was now large enough to grab the half the creature in each of her meaty hands as she struggled to force it apart. It held momentarily, but any hope of remaining in one piece was quickly dashed as Asuka's body began to engorge and expand yet again, the hands starting to envelop the creature as it was ripped in half.

Not content there however, Asuka took the remaining pieces and ripped what was left again and again as it if was paper. Her body, still expanding, ripped into what remained with greater and greater ease until nothing remained of the Angel, its AT field providing no protection against the might of the musclebound Asuka. With her adrenaline still pumping, the gigantic red haired girl let out a primal scream, the scream of a predator having destroyed its prey.

**************************************************************************** *************

As soon as word spread of an Angel attacking Tokyo-3, NERV personnel, as was protocol, had mobilized, preparing the EVA units for combat. However, on this particular incident, the personnel noticed a musclebound Ritsuko giving the launch order, which would have been the biggest surprise of the day had they not noticed what had destroyed the Angel, not an EVA unit, but one of their pilots, having expanded to an absolutely ludicrous size.

Asuka's feet were now too large and wide for the roads of Tokyo-3, her mere toes bigger than any puny human, with her calves wider across than two skyscrapers bundled together. The legs rose into two thighs wider than city blocks on their own, meeting and forming an enormously round rump that could flatten a quarter of the city if the girl felt the need to sit down.

Her upper body was no less monstrous in scale. Asuka's abdominal muscled resembled armor instead of flesh, so thick not even an N2 mine could penetrate it. Her pectorals bulged out (proportionally) feet from her body, yet stood firm. Each arm was rippling with bulging muscles that rose and fell higher than her head, while her back was wide as a mountain, able to carry at least two cities the size of Toyko-3 on it.

On top of this body, rising impossibly high into the air, was a recognizable face, grinning at how small everything looked compared to her, ecstatic at the fact that she was taller than any skyscraper, wider than any mountain, and stronger than any force on the planet. The members of NERV could only look on in awe, disgust, and in the case of Shinji Ikari, a mix of fear and arousal. After several minutes of staring, the silence broke.

"W...what do we do?" Misato asked. All eyes focused on Gendo Ikari, who quickly made a decision.
122221221121212212112211121.title: No match for her muscles

choices: The remaining two children Shinji and Rei are chosen
Her roommates Shinji and Misato are chosen
1222212211212122121122111212.content:
Ikari was no fool, unbeknown to any one outside of Ritsuko herself Gendo had been the key figure in having the muscle-powering serum be created in the first place. He knew of it's effects and he knew that it was more then capable of creating a being of pure power, as Asuka had obviously proven, his ace in the hole in case things became to dicey in the war against the angels or if SEELE truly decided in making their presence known against him.

Unlike the Evangelion units however Asuka, muscle-bound as she was, was still in fact human. She could be negotiated with, there was no value in being openly hostile with her after all Asuka in turn had done a great service for him even if she wasn't aware of it.

Yes he needed her mountainous mass to be in his control, at his very whim. But first he had to bring her back to his side.

"Orders, Commander?" questioned Misato once more, still unsure how they were going to deal with the muscle monster Asuka had become.

To hers and the rest of the bridge's surprise Ikari ordered that Asuka be negotiated with. Misato holding her tongue from calling the man out on what was potentially crazy. As much as she cared for the girl the redheaded titan needed to be subdued before things got even more out of hand.

"With respect you make it seem, Commander, as if she will actually be willing to talk." Ritsuko mentioned, like Misato she too wasn't completely sold on Ikari's decision.

"She will. She openly attacked the angel because in her mind she saw it as not only a threat to her well-being but the perfect way of gaining a better understanding of what she has become. She will see no challenge from us instead we will do what we must to bring her back into our fold."

Shinji while having remain silent the entire time knew exactly what his father was planning. He wasn't planning on stopping and curing Asuka he merely wanted her as yet another weapon under his command. He almost began to wonder who the real monster was.

"How do you propose we speak with her, if she is even willing to negotiate that is." asked Misato still eying the monitors that broadcasted the images of Asuka to everyone in the room.

"We will sent out a pair to speak with her."

Everyone stood or sat still wondering who were the two that would speak with the monstrous German girl.
1222212211212122121122111212.title: To have the power of a goddess in his control

choices: The negotiations go well
The negotiations go poorly
12222122112121221211221112122.content:
"Why me?" Misato asked when Gendo gestured to her.

"Several reasons. First, you haven't taken the formula nor, as per Dr. Itagki's story, directly attacked Asuka. So she won't see you as a threat or a rival. Secondly, you're quite familiar with Asuka and will be able to relate to her in a way that someone else may not."

"Ok, and why is someone whose toes are bigger than I am supposed to listen to me?"

Still wearing his usual stoic expression, Gendo instead asked another question. "Tell me, what is something that size supposed to eat to sustain itself?"

Shinji winced, knowing where this was going, but Misato merely look confused.

"There's a very good reason why in nature creatures do not grow to sizes like that on land. There's far too much mass to sustain given the resources available in nature. Resources that NERV can provide her...in exchange for her cooperation."

Misato nodded, realizing where the nature of their negotiations were going to head.

"Unit 01 will accompany a single helicopter equipped with speakers, having with it a standard rifle and prog knife. At no time is Unit 01 to show any hostility towards the Second Child unless directly attacked. Understood?"

Both Shinji and Misato offered simple salutes, then went off to prepare. The rest of the staff in turn, looked on at the cameras still showing Asuka's enormous mass, even as she began to walk away from the city, presumably to find something to do.

"Everything is ready to go Commander Ikari. Both the helicopter and Unit 01 have been equipped with the speakers you requested and are ready for deployment."

"Then proceed."
12222122112121221211221112122.title: Logic vs adrenaline

choices: Upon return Gendo has a conversation with Asuka
Later Asuka speaks with Shinji and Rei
122221221121212212112211121221.content:
Sitting within the cockpit of his Evangelion unit Shinji could only stare in awe and, well-intended, fear as he and the chopper that his guardian Misato was using for transport neared the humongous redhead.

Shinji couldn't help but wonder if his Eva even at it's fullest of power could take Asuka in a showdown, considering she had literally ripped an angel into pieces of it were made of paper. A big part of him was hoping it wouldn't have to come to something like that.

Just outside of Tokyo-3's boundaries the gigantic German girl picked up on the sound of something approaching, two somethings from the sounds of it. She turned over just as Misato called out to her on the loud speaker.

"Asuka! Stop!"

She smiled a tad when as she heard the familiar sound of older woman's voice.

"Well well I didn't expect you out here, Misato."

'Yeah well neither did I', the woman thought before figured it wasn't the best of opening statements.

"First off I want to congratulate you on successfully defeating the angel from earlier."

"Defeating? I ripped it to shreds!" the mammoth redhead boasted with a flex of her immense bicep.

"Look at me, Misato, I'm the most powerful being walking the planet."

Of course it made sense that along side her muscles Asuka's own ego had inflated to impossible portions. However the girl wasn't fool she knew that her keeper hadn't come to just celebrate her victory.

"But that's not why you're here is it, Misato?" She paused after having at last spotted Unit One, "And I see you brought Shinji with you. Like what you see, Shinji?" she asked teasing the boy with a flex of her stunning chest.

The boy refused to comment and lucky for him Misato re-averted attention back to her.

"This isn't about Shinji, Asuka, but you're right...I'm here on direct order from The Commander to bring you back to base. Your job is done thus you're asked to return."

A moment of silence fell upon them before the mighty redhead broke it with her laughter.

"I wasn't aware I was on the clock? I wasn't aware that I have to go back now, are you really in any condition to ask that of me, Misato? I'm more powerful then you could ever imagine what if I just decided to continue on, what then, you going to stop me?"

Misato paused for a moment choosing her words carefully. Her orders were clear and Asuka was in a way right she was too powerful to simply let go, she had to convince her to stay.

Back at the Geofront Commander Ikari along with the rest of the staff watched silently, Gendo putting his trust in the major otherwise he'd have to step in himself...

"Regardless of what you've become, Asuka, you are still a part of NERV that means you must still answer to Commander Ikari. Like it or not you are still part of this organization."

"At this size I can do whatever I please, Misato! Do you really think I should take answers from anyone other then myself now, I crushed an angel with my bare hands! I'm bigger, stronger, more powerful then any force on the planet!"

The redhead boasted yet again as she flex every portion of her body three times over, her muscle structure reaching even higher mind-boggling levels. Shinji trembled slightly in his seat believing that if she kept at it Asuka was very possible of outgrowing all of Japan!

He shivered at the thought he gather himself however as he heard the voice of his father.

"Under no circumstance is the Second Child allowed to leave, do you understand?"

"B...but I thought we were going non-violent?" he answered with a question of his own.

"If Katsuragi fails I entrust that you will use every once of Unit One's power to bring back Souryu. We will not lose her."

Shinji didn't respond and he wasn't at all surprised with his father's order. Asuka was still a weapon to him nothing more nothing less. Dammit he didn't want her leave but at the same time as usual he didn't approve of his father's actions.

"Asuka listen to me. If you leave now you'll no doubt become an enemy of the world. Every nation with the power to do so will label you as a treat. You'll be hunted as if you were a monster."

"And you think I can't take care of myself? You don't get it do you I don't need your help or your protection anymore! I'm not the same little girl who moved in with you I've become a goddess!"

That's it Misato had failed and his father was going to order him at any moment now to subdue Asuka in whatever way he could...

"No...you leave now, Asuka...you become no better then the very thing you just ripped apart."

Shinji's dark eyes snapped open while Asuka's nearly bulged out of their sockets. Misato's words had seemingly hit her with enough force that even her impenetrable muscles couldn't protect her.

"What did you just say?"

"You heard me. You make your leave and you will be no different then any angel we've ever encountered or fought."

For first time in a good while the redhead was stunned silent.

"Return to NERV, Asuka, we can sustain and provide for your every need. There's no need for any of this to end so poorly. Please Asuka!"

The uneasy silence from earlier had returned with twice the intensity. However soon enough and without a word said the titanic girl took a few earth-rattling steps forward, Shinji and Misato wondering what would be her ultimate decision?

"I'm no angel nor am I a monster...I'm just me, the best at what I do."

She smiled a confident smile, it was almost clear what she had decided but the two still weren't entirely sure.

"You want me to go back? Alright I guess I can do that, after all unlike Wondergirl or that weakling Shinji I'm going to protect everyone and end this war with the angels."

Supremely arrogant she may be but at last her roommates were allowed to let loose a deep sigh of relief. Asuka, in all her muscular glory, was thankfully still part of the team. Now with that settled it was time to head back to NERV HQ.
122221221121212212112211121221.title: Slight tension aside the negotiations go well

choices: Saddened, she regrets a little being so huge
Happy, since she has someone to talk to who can understand her
1222212211212122121122111212212.content:
Later that night after the sun had set, Shinji got a message saying that Asuka wanted to speak with him and Rei in private. Shinji was still scared of Asuka but nonetheless felt he had to at least talk to her and clear up a few things.

He met up with Rei, still pumped up and muscular from before, before heading over see Asuka.

"Don't know, I hope its not about her boasting about how strong she is again, though.... I feel that they're may be something else that's bugging her."

12222122112121221211221112122121.content:
As the duo walked up to Asuka's face, they were surprised to see that she didn't have her usual confident expression. Instead, she looked incredibly depressed. Feeling worried about her, Shinji walked up to Asuka and place his hand on her giant cheek to try and comfort her.

"What's wrong Asuka?" he asked.

"What do you think? Just look at me! I'm a huge freak! I was so caught up in wanting to get stronger that I completely ignored what I was doing to myself... I may be the strongest thing in the world now, but I don't even look human anymore! I'm nothing but a monster now..." Asuka said, tears beginning to stream down her face.

Just then, Shinji surprised both Rei and Asuka by slapping the massive girl's cheek with all of his strength.

"Don't say that, Asuka! You're not a monster! No matter what you look like on the outside, you're still you on the inside. That much will never change, no matter how big you end up getting."

"But I... No, you're right Shinji. I am me, no matter what I look like. I just wish that there was some way to change this... A way to take back everything I did and get my old body back... I was foolish to think that I ever really wanted to turn myself into this." Asuka said, reaching up to wipe the tears away from her face.

However, much to her despair, her muscles were simply too big, and she was unable to reach her face with their obstruction. Now more depressed than before, Asuka punched the nearby wall to vent her frustration, leaving a gaping hole in it.

"Oh, who am I kidding! I can't live like this! How am I supposed to eat?! Where am I supposed to sleep?! I just can't take it anymore! I want to go back to my normal life! I want to go to school, and to find a boyfriend! Why did I ever think that it was a good idea to turn myself into this... this... this muscle monster!" Asuka cried out, cursing herself for what she had done.

Shinji simply reached out his arms to hug Asuka's cheek in an attempt to comfort her, and while it did make her feel a bit better, it didn't erase the fact that she was stuck like this now. After several minutes, however, Asuka began to feel something strange welling up in the pit of her stomach. Before anyone had any idea what was going on, Asuka began to shrink down. All three of them watched in surprise as all of Asuka's immense muscle mass began to recede into her body once again. Soon she had returned to her original slender feminine figure, and was beginning to shrink down to her original height as well. As she was shrinking, she grabbed on to the bridge that Shinji & Rei were standing on and pulled herself up to stand beside them.

By the time everything was over, Asuka looked almost exactly as she did before she ever had herself injected with the muscle-growth formula in the first place. The one difference was that her body now appeared to be much more toned. The only fat anywhere on her body was isolated into its ideal locations, namely her breasts and her butt. Her muscles were much more defined than they used to be, but they didn't bulge out and engulf her body like they did only moments earlier. She now had a much more athletic build, and while her muscles were still clearly defined, they no longer interfered with her slender and feminine figure.

"W-what just happened to me?" Asuka asked as she looked at her two friends, surprised to find herself the same height as them once again.

"I believe that your intense emotions caused a reaction in the formula that reversed its effects." Rei said in her usual monotone voice.

"You mean I'm really back to normal again? But it's weird... I don't feel like I got any weaker... It feels like I still have all of that strength inside of me."

Just then, Rei surprised Asuka by reaching out and grabbing her by the wrist. Rei then used her own augmented muscle to lift Asuka into the air. Asuka began to struggle to break free from the much more muscular girl's grip, and much to her surprise she was able to completely overpower Rei with minimal effort. Breaking free from her grip, Asuka glared angrily at the blue-haired girl.

"Hey! What gives, Wondergirl?!" Asuka asked in frustration.

"It was a test. You said that you felt you still had all of your strength, so I decided to test that theory. It would seem that all the strength you gained didn't just go away. Instead, it would seem that every bit of it has been compressed into a single superdense layer of muscle. Simply put, you still have all of your strength from before, but it has now been compacted to fit your original form." Rei stated.

"You mean, I haven't lost any of my muscle? It's all still inside of me?"

"Precisely. It would seem that you have gained the ability to control your form through sheer willpower. You can most likely also freely manipulate your size as well."

"Really? Well, let's test that theory out then, shall we?" Asuka said, starting to get excited once again.

Just then, she jumped off of the bridge and began to expand once again. Within mere moments, she had grown a massive height of 100 feet tall, while still maintaining her slender feminine shape. After taking a moment to admire herself, Asuka shrank back down and rejoined Rei and Shinji on the bridge. By now, the red-headed girl had regained all of her lost confidence. She wasn't sad at all anymore. She now felt incredibly excited by her newfound powers.

She had truly become a goddess now. She had all of this unbelievable power at her command, and she knew exactly how she was going to use it. She was going to use it to protect those who are precious to her. She had always been searching for a place where she belonged, and now she had finally found it. This was her true purpose. She used to think that being an Eva pilot was why she was put on the earth, but she now realized that she was wrong about that. Her real place in the world was something much greater. She was destined to become the goddess that would protect the world and end the war against the angels with her own two hands. This planet that she and her friends called home. It was her duty to watch over it and keep it safe.

With this sudden realization of her true role in the world, Asuka couldn't help but smile. This was her time to shine. She would finally be able to prove her greatness to the world. It would only be a matter of time before everyone around the world knew her name. Asuka Langley Soryu, the supreme goddess and divine protector of the planet earth. Yes, she liked the sound of that.

What happens next?
12222122112121221211221112122121.title: From muscle monster to true goddess

Why did they choose now of all times to team up thought Misato in a cold sweat. It would be her last thought for a while however...

"Nothing personal, Misato."

Those words came from the German muscle goddess before replicating what Rei had done earlier and swiftly knocking her legal guardian out with a clean blow to the back of the head and neck region.

Misato's pumped up form fell with a resounding bang on the floor below, leaving a bit of a mark in the process. Asuka with a smirk of confidence and Rei with a look of indifference watched as the major also began to shrink in size. Her muscles retracing and reshaping back into her previous body size. Soon enough Misato laid on the floor a helpless speck in comparison to the two buffed teens standing before her.

The battle was over, in two strikes Rei and Asuka had eliminated their opposition. Now as Asuka had brought up was time to go collect on more of the muscle serum seeing how Ritsuko didn't have it on her person.

Asuka had done a few crazy things in her life, some she would later think back and regret others not so much...this was one of those times.

She wasn't really sure what had made her do it all she knew was her powerful feet had begun to move almost on their own. Was it the egotism desire to be the hero, was it because deep down she was enjoying this sudden on-the-spot partnership with Rei, or was it really just something done subconsciously without any real thought involved?

She didn't have the answer but as she felt herself descend in an almost awkward slow fashion Asuka curved her lips in something of a makeshift smile. Rei's sharp red orbs looking down her, an unreadable emotion shinning within them. Almost as if she wanted to ask why but could get her vocal cords to function properly.

Asuka fell with a stellar boom as she made impact with the cold titled floor below her. Cradled somewhat in Rei's immensely strong arms Asuka's smile never left not even for a moment. She still wasn't sure why she did what she did but knew enough to realize that in all likelihood her muscular dream was on the verge of ending here and now.

Her vision hazy she cracked a brief grin before mouthing the words, "I'm sorry...Rei..."

Asuka slipped into a state of unconsciousness no less then a second later. The often outspoken, egotistical, vain, and arrogant redhead had taken the finishing blow meant for Rei Ayanami...

Silently Rei watched as Asuka's body retracted and reshaped back into it's standard size. Her partner, her musclebound comrade in arms now reduced to the average build girl she once was.

It was strange and rather foreign to the blue-haired albino but as she watched Asuka shrink something insider her grew. It was some strange desire of vengeance to get back at the one who had hurt and defeated Asuka (she recalled experiencing a similar desire with Shinji...). This anger, this sudden rage it was beginning to take shape inside her beginning to boil many times over.

"I'm sorry...Rei..."

Asuka's sad words, ironic with the grin, rang in her ears. Just as with the angels Asuka had given up her own well-being just so Rei could continue forward. On top of that she had referred to her using a first-name basis. No nickname no offensive cuss, instead by her actual name.

Holding the now normal fallen form of Asuka in a strong hands. Rei took in a breath before staring directly at Misato, the older woman could feel even her powerful knees shake at the ice-cold stare.

Rei said nothing instead she simply let go of the pressure building inside her due to Asuka's selfless sacrifice.

122221221121222211122.content:
Ritsuko felt her head spin for a moment before she began to feel the sensation of someone shaking her awake. Once the roughed up doctor came around she surprisingly spotted Maya Ibuki kneeling before her.

"Oh good you're finally awake Sempei." stated Maya with a relief of happiness spreading across her sweet face.

"Maya...?" Apparently Ritsuko was still a bit shaken up. Maya then assisted her up to her feet.

"Senpai, what happened here? What's going on?"

With a shake of her head Ritsuko explained it all as best she could to the younger woman.

"I...see..." Maya frankly had a bit of a hard time understanding yet she could see the "signs" left behind by the now mighty Misato. Maya thanked her lucky stars she hadn't run into any of the muscle bound ladies currently running around Nerv compound.

Regardless the situation was bad. Misato not only had gone off the deep end like Asuka but was the biggest and no doubt baddest and while Rei was apparently the calmest of the three she still present a major threat to anyone who opposed her or the sudden team up of the blue haired young woman and her greatest rival now turned partner.

Maya rubbed the side of her forehead temples it was almost too much to bare.

"Maya"

The young lieutenant's attention snapped back into focus as she heard the doctor call out to her.

Ritsuko sat on a not so comfy plastic folding chair as she steadily recovered, Misato while obviously not wanting to kill her best friend had really rocked the blonde woman's world guess it was only luck that she had escape with no real injuries. Thinking back it had to be nothing short of a damn miracle that she WAS still in one piece.

While thankful for that Ritsuko was also willing to bet she could acquire a gene cleaner of sorts if she poked around inside of Nerv's database. There had to be a cure somewhere she just had to find it but obviously that meant that she herself couldn't be found.

Misato didn't seem to want any more serum, thankfully, but Rei and Asuka were surely hunting her down if they hadn't already run into Misato that is. While that would buy her time she needed more just to be on the safe side, after all what if Misato decided she did need more of "the good stuff".

It pained her to do this but...

"Maya, you know I trust you and consider you a close personal friend."

Ritsuko paused for a moment.

"That's why...I need you to use the serum..."

Maya gasped at the thought, what was her superior thinking to suggest such an idea? Hadn't she just told her that the other three women had been altered by the after effects!

Before Maya could object Ritsuko held out a hand in hopes the younger woman would hear her out.

"Maya I need to find a cure to all of this. I'm the only one who can if I inject myself now that would be impossible. Plus in my tired state I'm not so sure my body would be able to cope with the sudden muscular growth. That's why it has to be you. I just need you to find them hold them off if you can while I repair all the damage done by this blasted chemical compound!"

Maya stood silent for a moment taking in everything her superior had just said. It was admittedly a rather tall order and the young lieutenant wasn't sure if she be of any real use even with the serum running through her veins. That said...

"But what if I lose control and attack you, Senpai! I wouldn't be able to live with myself knowing I could have the strength to kill you if I suddenly went ballistic..."

"I already told you I trust you, Maya." Ritsuko repeated with a soft smile.

"Senpai..."

"I...I'll do it. I'll buy you all the time you need." Maya exclaimed with an embarrassing tone of sudden confidence.

"Good. Now step over here."

Maya did as told rolling up her jacket sleeve as she did so.

Turning the corner Maya comes face to face with a near collapsed Ritsuko. The doctor seem beyond exhausted but was somehow forcing herself to remain in an upright position.

"Ma...Maya?" asked Ritsuko in a tired fashion.

Ritsuko before instructing Maya to help in carrying her toward the same elevator Maya had used earlier. While normally Maya would have been more then happy to help carry Ritsuko anywhere this time however she simply nodded firmly before assisting the worn-out doctor.

Because of her whispering Maya had to lean in slightly to catch everything her superior was explaining to her. If Asuka and Rei were superhuman now though they'd tear NERV apart looking for Ritsuko, Asuka was obviously a loose canon always on the verge of exploding when things didn't go her way and Rei was fiercely determined when she wanted to accomplish anything.

Separate they were major trouble together...Maya didn't want to think of the the two of them actually forming a functioning team.

As the elevator continued upward Maya glanced over at the resting form of Ritsuko, she couldn't begin to imagine what the poor woman had just gone through. The elevator continued to climb and Lieutenant Ibuki sighed once more...

Maya stared at her superior and the case carrying the muscle growth serum.

To think that those that protected everyone at NERV were now a very real threat. It was ironic in a cosmic sort of way, put too much faith along with chances of survival on one particular entity and in the end either it will always work out or it will backfire horribly and leave you in a state of hopelessness.

The whole thing reminded her of when the Evangelion Units would go berserk. Using playing with things not meant for human hands and yet...

Ritsuko slowly eyed Maya's silent form the young woman hadn't said a word yet glancing at chocolate-tinted eyes of the lieutenant she could make out a bit of unreadable emotion. Something was stirring inside Maya's head. What that was she'd soon find out.

"Senpai...can you find a cure if you had enough time?"

Ritsuko was slightly surprised at the sudden and rather serious tone Maya had just adopted into her speech. It was unlike her regardless.

"If I can search through the numerous data records yes I'm confident I can find an antidote."

"How long would you need?" again with the total seriousness, definitely wasn't like Maya.

"It's...uncertain...there is a lot to go through but I should still be able to manage and make good time." Ritsuko stated yet she was still bothered by Maya's behavior.

"Maya what exactly are you getting at?"

"Senpai...I don't like fighting. I don't like seeing others get hurt much less the ones I care for. I'm...often too weak to help much less be of any real difference..."

Ritsuko sat silently allowing Maya to get everything she needed to out in the open.

"I'm pacifistic by nature or maybe I'm just naturally scared whatever the case I avoid danger at any cost but this time...I can't be scared I can't avoid what has to be done."

"Maya..."

Senpai...use the serum on me."

The statement made Ritsuko nearly leap to her feet.

"You have to find the cure and that means I have to be the one to stop those two. I don't know how or if I can but I'm willing to try." Maya explained with a nervous chuckle.

"You're serious?"

"Very, maybe more so then I've ever been. Senpai you've always watched over me during my entire time here at Nerv let me be the one to watch over you now. Even if it's just this one time."

Maya smiled slightly as she felt a deep blush build in and around her cheeks, her words were a lot more emotional then even she had intended them to be.

Smiling Ritsuko said nothing instead simply nodded in a quick fashion. Maya thanked her for understanding.

"Come here and roll up your sleeve so I can inject the serum into you." she instructed, Maya doing as told.

"You know Maya you may just have an advantage over the two of them as far as the after effects are concerned."

Interested Maya raised an eyebrow and questioned what Ritsuko had meant.

"You lack the desire to fight. You wish for peace of mind rather then corruption of soul. Those peaceful ideals of yours may just be your key to keeping your sanity in check while the serum runs through you." Ritsuko explained while preparing the vial into the syringe.

"Doesn't Ayanami have that as well?"

"No...while Rei is nearly emotionless she does still have small traces of emotion within her. Those samples however are not as innocent as yours are. Ayanami is duty-bound always has been always will be, give her a mission and she see it to the end same for accomplishing anything she deems is of value.

Right now she's working off that mind-set. She sees the serum as a goal she must meet. Now do you understand how the two of you differ?"

Maya nodded her right sleeve now rolled up as best she could do.

"Good. During and after the growth runs it's course stay true to that Maya. You are indeed the only one now that can stop Rei and Asuka."

Before proceeding Ritsuko asked Maya if she was truly ready, this procedure was after all going to change her life, the younger woman nodded she was ready she had to do this to protect her Senpai and protect NERV in general. Maya had to ensure that when Misato came back home from overseas travel and The Commander returning from...where ever it was he went during the highly classified meetings with SEELE that NERV was still around.

Understandably Maya was scared but placed a brave face on as she held held her breath in the moment the needle pierced her creamy untanned flesh and made contact with a blood vein.

Maya clenched her teeth slightly as she felt the serum run from the vial into her blood system. Nearly biting her own tongue in two as the serum caused her to feel as if her body was being set ablaze from the inside out!

Ritsuko shouted words of encouragement to the courageous young woman explaining that the pain would soon pass and that she simply had to stay strong until then. Easier said then done thought Maya in a huff.

A yell of anguish escaped the lieutenant's lip nearly causing her to fall to a singular knee. Instead Maya began to feel it...the serum was beginning to alter her body.

An audible stretching and growing sound was heard as Maya and Ritsuko watched in amazement as Maya's once lithe body shape expanded larger, thicker, and more powerful then she had ever been.

Legs and thighs now as thick as trees, tearing away at the white tights Maya always wore to work it was quickly noted that her feet had burst clear out of her work shoes.

Her arms followed in equal turn, as did her shoulders, pecs/breasts, and her newly forming set of abs all tearing apart her uniform as it were made of paper.

With a slight stretch from her increasing growing back Maya tore out of her uniform and instead left herself with a very stretched black undershirt, afterward a second pop was heard as Maya's new chest area snapped her bra clean off.

Using a now massive arm, with an equally impressive cannonball-sized bicep, Maya reached in underneath and tossed her busted bra aside but not before gasping at how large just one of her arms had grown.

Finally the growth came to an end and Maya now along with her new beyond body builder size stood a few inches taller then the blonde doctor herself. Maya was naturally shorter then Ritsuko so apparently the serum had buffed up her height along with her muscles, most likely to make easier for her to move around.

Maya stood gasping and a tad bit sweaty from the mind-blowing ordeal, unknowingly she flexed causing her body to swell a good deal more, putting even more of a strain on her already by miracle super stretchy clothing. Realizing this Maya released her flex, her body shrinking back to it's already impressive shape.

"Senpai..."

The elevator simply came to a stop and the twin doors opened up allowing access to the new hallway. Ritsuko stepped through afterwards she told Maya to hold the doors open. The younger woman easily did just that.

Bringing out a vial of the muscle growth serum Ritsuko handed it over explaining that Maya should only use it if absolutely necessary.

Eventhough it appeared to the good doctor that Maya was bigger and stronger then Rei and Asuka she was still going into a dangerous two-on-one situation. The vial of serum would be her trump card in case things got too out of hand for even someone of Maya's strength.

Maya accepted the gift and promised to only use it just as she been instructed to.

"Be careful."

Maya nodded, "Of course thank you, Senpai."

Releasing her hand the elevator door closed in front of Maya and behind Ritsuko. Silently the blonde woman wished her junior muscle-bound co-worker the best of luck for she had a nagging feeling in the pit of her stomach that things weren't going to be easy.

The elevator descended and Maya, with her massive arms crossed around her equally fearsome chest, watched silently as the numbers counted downward toward the medical area....and where Rei and Asuka awaited...

12313.content:
"Wh-what the hell?!"

Asuka bent over, clutching her chest in pain as it pushed out. A distinct ripping sound rang out from below, as she felt her shirt pressing in tighter and tighter against her skin. She caught a quick glimpse of the apartment room between bouts of excruciating growing pain; and, standing in the center, she spotted someone out of the corner of her eye.

The third child.

While hesitant at first, Shinji dragged Misato to the sound of the crashing. Examining the room, he saw imprints torn into the floor, shaped like large hands or feet; and shattered glass everywhere. Had she been kidnapped? Shinji immediately went pale. What if she'd been kidnapped, right under his nose? He'd be to blame for pissing her off- if something had happened, the weight would be entirely on his shoulders... Just like Misato hanging on his shoulders now, still unaware of what was going on.

Then, her screams again, from outside. Shinji turned his head, and nearly fainted. Asuka's visage filled the window, her blue eyes wider than saucers, peering right at him.

One hundred feet.

The redhead felt her now-exposed backside bumping against the neighboring apartment. She could barely grasp the situation- not only only was excruciating pain going through her entire form, that milquetoast pilot was GAWKING at her. All her life, she'd been trained in the Eva Project, her skills honed to absolute perfection; and now, that AMATEUR was seeing her in weakness, taken by surprise, horrified and lacking control?!

In blind rage and agony, she lurched backwards, her bare heel crushing a parked car like a tin can. Her backside made its way into the opposite building, tearing through glass and concrete like nothing; this only worsened her pain. One hand still pressed to her chest, the girl moved her open palm out into the apartment, shattering the wall, as she screamed: "DON'T LOOK!"

The words bellowed through Shinji's ears, as he was quickly assaulted with rubble and torn fabric. Instinctively, he ducked behind Misato, who seemed to snap awake. They were both taken over by screaming, as Asuka's elongated fingers and smooth palm pressed through the wall, as if to grasp them. Long-buried memories of experiments with giant robots echoed in Shinji's mind; meanwhile, Misato recalled the horrors of the Second Impact that she barely survived. They were unable to do anything but obey the redhead's demands. Slowly, the hand began to retract, and they gaped at the woman.

Two hundred and fifty feet.

Biting her lip, Asuka covered her chest and head as she felt her shorts begin to give way. It soon became impossible for her body to stay within the streets; her toes and backside pushed against the building behind her with such great force that it started to topple over. Shutting her eyes, she mumbled to herself in German- "Keine Angst. Keine angst." She bit her quivering lip, and concentrated on thoughts about her parents, her homeland, on Kaji...

People below fled from the lumbering redhead's movements, the sounds of the crumbling tower echoing through the landscape. Her ass had effortlessly sent an entire building tumbling down. Misato had rushed out to inform her superiors as soon as possible. A red alert sounded out at Nerv, and scientists rushed to collect data on their growing pilot. Citizens were ordered to evacuate, as buildings retreated into the Geofront. While staying as still as possible, Asuka's exponentially increasing growth was already making quick work of the buildings. Misato's apartment was in the older parts of Tokyo-3, so not many people lived there; unfortunately, this also meant fewer buildings had proper maintenance, and most stood perfectly still, waiting for Asuka's feet or backside to overtake them. In the distance, Kensuke wrestled with Hikari over his video camera, arguing over whether filming Asuka was a scientific exploit or voyeurism.

Inside, Shinji couldn't help but glance to her- before immediately turning his head away. She was far larger than an Evangelion- but, even at her height, she looked like the same old Asuka. Shinji struggled to understand how someone could be so... Big.

Five hundred feet.

"I... I told you not to look at me!"

Her voice boomed out between shallow gasps for breath. It was more and more difficult to look into the apartment- she had to lie on her stomach. Asuka's breasts drew craters in the cement, as her feet spread out behind, kicking away anything unlucky enough to get in their way. The dark-haired boy answered only by bowing his head in shame, turned away. Her bare back was exposed to the air, a valley of flesh, her backside sticking out like a mountain chain.

"I'm- I'm going to be fine, you loser. Don't you dare worry."

Shinji kept his back turned, listening to the screams outside growing quieter as people evacuated. He felt like he had to say something, some way or another- but what?

"H-how did you... How did you get so big?"

"I don't know!"

The force of her voice blew him back- but he still didn't dare turn. Looking at Asuka was difficult- but not looking at her, even with her breasts invisible, was even harder. He couldn't read her tone from the shout- was she hurt? What could he do?

"We- we should get help, Asuka."

"WHAT, like Nerv can't handle this themselves? The Third Child just HAS to rush in and save the day, doesn't he? Ow..."

She peered in closer to the minuscule boy's form, destroying more of her room as she attempted to read his emotions. The German girl wasn't ready to accept help from this squirt. She was NOT going to be a frail, helpless person, like when her mother died- no matter how much it hurt.

"I... I just wanted to-"

"Be a hero, like always? Shinji, just leave me alone!"

"Asuka, this isn't just YOUR problem." He struggled not to turn, trying to keep his tone of voice as quiet as possible- but he couldn't help but be a little defensive. "This could be dangerous. You need to-"

"I don't NEED you to tell me what to do! I'll handle this on my own!"

"You could KILL someone like this! You're turning into a monster!"

"...Monster..."

The word seemed much quieter than before- and it was followed by an eerie silence. Slowly, curiosity overtook the Third Child, as he turned his head to look to the ever-growing Asuka.

He saw her toes flying right towards the building.

Seven hundred and fifty feet.

Before the Second Child registered what she was doing, it had already happened. One foot was dug deep into the ground. The other had crashed through the apartment's walls, leaving a clear dent. It didn't even reach up to her knees. She could feel the steel against her, sharp and cold... And as she took her foot out, a sickening creak. The building started to collapse.

Shinji's fit of panicked screams was interrupted by the feeling of falling. His entire body, and the contents of Asuka's room, were slowly sagging towards the window. He rushed forward, grabbing onto the doorframe as he was pulled into the gap. Misato flew through the door; Shinji tried to reach out for her, but couldn't. He didn't dare watch as she fell through the window of the tilting room. Gritting his teeth, his hands felt weaker and weaker, his legs buckling as they gave way. Memories of his childhood and battles flashed through his mind, as he fell...

...Onto a soft, warm pillow.

After what felt like hours of fear, Shinji's eyes flashed open. He was next to Misato, the two of them resting on a wrinkled, peach surface. Looking around, it seemed to stretch for ages and ages. And, a short distance away, was Misato's apartment room- walls cracking, sideways, and everything overturned, but in one piece. Hesitating for a second, he climbed to the top of the apartment's walls, and glanced down.

A gasp.

One thousand feet tall.

Asuka's eyes were shut, her head tilted to the side. Every now and then, she'd turn a little, or moan, before going back to stillness. Her orange hair spread out like a blanket of ropes over the buildings. Shinji looked down upon her titanic face, looking at peace. The entire apartment room was in her hand, which lay on her bosom. He understood- she'd torn the room out and grabbed them right as they were falling. Was it to show off, or make him feel even worse? Or maybe she wasn't as bad as he thought.

And, either from emotional exhaustion, overwhelming growing pains, or under the weight of her own body, she'd fallen onto her back, unconscious.

The titanic woman lay resting on Tokyo-3's older district, buildings and cars turned to little more than rubble under her. At her full height, she'd stand nearly as high as the Tokyo Tower; even now, buildings struggled to reach the top of her toes. And with a temper like hers, the world might be doomed. But now... Her quiet, relaxed breathing seemed barely threatening at all. Almost lonely, Shinji thought.

Nobody could've suspected: this was all going according to Seele's plan. Keel Lorenz and his council looked upon the scene from the safety of their room, pleased with their work; who could've known it'd have such results!

"M-mom..."

Asuka stirred suddenly. She raised her head, eyes opening and gazing left and right with a certain tired detachment. Slowly, they fell onto Shinji, in her hands. Silently, she whispered about how sick she felt. An ironic smile crept across her lips, as she said...

Asuka had developed an hour glass figure of sorts, with her bloated hips sticking out, her butt jiggling with each individual step of her rather porky thighs. While her stomach did roll over the lips of her jeans, her breasts were ginormous. They were still perky, thankfully, but, if Misato was not mistaken, were probably either large C-cups or small D-cups. Asuka’s face had grown round, as had her arms, which rounded out into ten pudgy digits.

“So, looks like you cleaned up a lot here,” Asuka observed, paying neither of their gains any mind at first.

“Uh, yeah, there was a lot of stuff that happened, and, uh, yeah, stuff, and—”

“Something bothering you?” Asuka asked, glancing over, confused toward her clearly flustered former major.

“Oh, uh, not really,” Misato replied, trying to sound off-handed, but coming off more as startled, unsettled, even mildly panicked, “It’s just that— uh, heehee, how to say it? –You know, you sorta, no offense or anything, but, uh—”

“Oh,” Asuka’s round face fell, eyes narrowed into mild slits as she walked away, shaking her head, “Don’t worry. That’s just what happens when you start to tour America for a couple months. Culture shock and all that. Ya know, I never realized how easy it was to gain weight when there was a McDonalds on every corner. Not like I like that shit anymore. I don’t think I could ever go to a fast food place ever again.”

“Why’s that?”

“Because it’s greasy and gross, that’s why,” Asuka mumbled, “Took awhile to realize that, but damn! After binging on all that junk, you start to get real sick of it, ya know?”

Misato actually hadn’t reached that point yet, but, not to feel like a total pig of any kind, she nodded and agreed with the girl. This satisfied the German, as she then proceeded to take a seat on the nearest sofa, the furniture groaning under her weight, not so much because she was heavy so much because Misato had damaged the legs whenever she placed her own butt on the cushions.

“Just out of mild curiosity how did you put on weight?”

“Oh, well, boredom, lots of junk food, Kaji wanted to experiment—these things just kinda happen.”

“Yeah, I guess—KAJI EXPERIMENTING!? With what, dare I ask?!” Asuka stammered, her cherubic face now as red as her hair.

Misato blushed before continuing, “Oh, just to see if it felt better.”

“If WHAT felt better? No, wait, don’t tell me! I already know!” Asuka sighed, “Hey, Misato, how is Kaji,m anyway?”

“Oh, he’s fine.”

“Okay. Hey, do you know how…”

15111.content:
"You can't do this to me!" Maya screamed into the phone, desperately.

"Lieutenant Ibuki, please. We're not asking you to have a root canal, we're just asking you to...take a break. Relax for a little bit. Have some YOU time."

"I already have to put up with myself more than I want to!"

"That's...very sad. But we feel that you are simply too stressed these days, and frankly, it's showing in the quality of your work."

"What if an Angel attacks while I'm off on this stupid imposed exile???"

"We will be fine. There are others who can fill in for you temporarily, and we would rather they do your job as best they can, than have you perform it at less than your full capacity."

"You can't do this!"

"We can do it. And really, in a sense, we already have. You are no longer assigned clearance until we feel you are ready. Have a good day."

And with that, the bastard (some faceless NERV bureaucrat) hung up.

Rude! thought Maya.

Maya looked around her apartment sadly. This...was not good. She was a hard worker. And what work she'd been doing! Helping to save the world! Now THAT was a meaningful job to clock into every morning. But now, she was stuck out of the loop, away from the excitement/horror (the horror, she wouldn't mind so much) of life at NERV. It was crazy there, but it felt more like home than her mostly empty apartment.

And what made this worse was that she wouldn't get to see senpai...Ritsuko...for who KNEW how long. And she had to admit, it hurt her that some stranger called to tell her this, rather than senpai letting her know, face-to-face. But, reflecting on Ritsuko's beauty, and wisdom, and kindness...surely, she had her reasons. Maya was simply incapable of being truly mad with her for any amount of time.

But nonetheless, this sucked. How the hell would she kill so much time? All her friends worked at NERV, and she couldn't really hang out with them at the moment. And her apartment was little more than a place to sleep in between days. It had little in the way of entertainment.

As she pondered, she felt a slight pang of hunger.

"Eh, that's one way to kill time." she figured. Time for a bite to eat. Her fridge was almost empty, which left her with two options.
15111.title: Maya's Road To Fat Begins

choices: She fixes up a meal, but it ends up...larger and more calorifix than expected.
Tear into the junk food!
151111.content:
The hunger was still far from biting, and she needed to fill her fridge and pantry sooner or later, so Maya decided to head to the store.

And it had to be said, NERV was generous enough with their paychecks. And since she hardly ever spent money, Maya had a healthy sum saved up in her back account.

However, between these two factors, Maya was going to fall into a self-set trap...she had never learned that one should never go shopping with an empty stomach, and a fat wallet. It always leads down the same road.

And sure enough, Maya piled her cart so high with every bit of food that caught even the least bit of her attention that she looked like she was getting ready to feed a whole town...a town with a soft spot for sweets, it seemed.

After shocking the cashier, Maya began the frightening task of loading all her food into her car, and then repeating the ordeal with bringing all her food up to her apartment, and then putting it all away. By the end of it all, she was so hungry and exhausted, that she no longer savored the idea of fixing herself up a nice, gourmet meal. The piles of junk food she splurged on called to her...what to do?
151111.title: Gettin' Some Food

choices: Hit up the ice cream!
Show some restraint!
1511112.content:
Ah, what the hell. She was on vacation, forced though it was, may as well act like it. Who was she trying to impress with her gourmet meal? At the moment, she had no obligations to anyone but herself. And right now, what she wanted was junk food.

She plopped her skinny butt on her couch, turned on the TV, kicked back, and merrily began munching on the piles of food she placed on either side of her.

Chocolate bars! Cookies of every description! Donuts, stuffed to the gills with filling! Three different brands of potato chips! And much, much more. She entered into a kind of food Nirvana, almost falling into a trance, the delicious tastes massaging her taste buds, the TV's images dancing before her, the couch resting beneath her, so soft and comfy. It's hard to say how much time passed, but she stayed in this state until her casual and constant grasping of food turned up nothing, and her search of the couch cushions on her left and right became frantic. But, alas...she had eaten everything she brought over.

"I ate THAT MUCH???"

Maya shook her head. Crazy!

But not as crazy as the fact that she knew she still had some ice cream in the fridge, and it was kind of calling to her...
1511112.title: Munching away.
