15111121.content:
Needless to say, self-control didn't put up much of a fight. Her marathon of gluttony continued until she was completely out of food, and drifted to sleep.

The next day, she went out and got more food, and got so hungry on the drive back from the grocery store that she felt the need to hit up a fast food drive-thru, and munched burger and fries the whole drive home. Just to tide her over.

She had to revisit the grocery store again that very day.

Predictably, the day after was quite similar, the only difference being the amount of food she bought, and while she paid little heed to it, the amount of weight she was putting on at record speed. Her metabolism was on vacation, too, it seemed, and every calorie that passed her insatiable lips ended up on her heavier, softer body.

Her hedonistic feeding frenzy went on for two whole weeks, before...
15111121.title: Feeding Frenzy

choices: "Maya, you're not supposed to know this, but..."
"Nothing, Maya. Never mind."
151111211.content:
Ritsuko had started to worry about Maya. She felt guilty about getting her to take a break in such a cowardly, impersonal manner, and because of that, she felt too awkward to contact her or apologize, which in turn, just made her feel worse. Sigh...friendships were so damn tricky. But keeping relationships strictly professional had not been one of Ritsuko's strong suits.

So it was a little nervously that she knocked on Maya's door, and waited for the door to be opened.

The door opened, and she could hear Maya groggily say "Wow, that was quick! I just ordered the pizza ten minutes ago-o-o-OH, GOD!"

Maya's eyes bugged as she saw that it was no pizza delivery person at the door, but rather her light and inspiration, Ritsuko!

And Ritsuko's eyes bugged as she saw that in a mere two weeks Maya had gained an impossible amount of weight. If she had put on a few pounds, that would be one thing, Ritsuko wouldn't judge. But to gain as fat as Maya had in so short a time was downright inhuman.

Maya's shirt could scarcely even cover her newly massive breasts (which were clearly far too big for any of her bras), let alone her belly, which now hung over her thighs and was working on spilling down to her knees. Her arms and legs had both thickened dramatically as well, and the shorts she was wearing were suffering trying to hold her no doubt enormous rear. The only part of her that hadn't been affected was her neck and face, which were absent of double chins, and remained as thin and petite as ever. This made for a strange contrast.

Maya was attempting to cover up her bare belly with her arms, which was a ridiculous thing to even try, and looked up at Ritsuko sheepishly.

"Maya...what...WHAT HAPPENED?" Ritsuko asked, leaning in and looking in shock at all the discarded and emptied boxes and bags of food, and cans and bottles of soda, that littered ever inch of the floor.

"I don't know! I guess...I dunno, I suppose I got a little carried away!"

"Maya, it should be impossible to eat as much as you apparently have! And even if someone did, it should still be impossible for them to put on as much weight as you have! It's supernatural!"

"I'm sorry!"

"What?...look, you don't have to apologize, I'm just...confused! This doesn't make any sense, unless...oh, no, unless this is because..."

"Because...because of what?"
151111211.title: Shocking Weight Gain

choices: ...a little aroused.
...kinda grossed out.
1511112111.content:
"Maya, you're not supposed to know this, but...NERV is not exactly the most...ethical of employers."

"I've noticed that."

"And...well, they've been known to tamper with the food and water of their employees."

"What do you mean?"

"Just that, sometimes...they slip things into the food and water of certain people."

"WHAT DID THEY DO TO ME???"

"I don't know! I might even be completely wrong! I've just heard rumor from...from someone! I don't know if they actually did, and if they did, then what it was, but it's possible that some mickey they slipped you is the cause of your...plump...new physique."

"Oh my God! That's unbelievable!"

"I know!"

"How could they?"

"I don't know!"

"I'm furious!"

"You should be!"

"I'm outraged!"

"You should be!"

"I'm hungry!"

"You should--!!!...SHOULDN'T be! How can you still be hungry? How much have you eaten just today?"

"Quite a bit, but...hey, if it's NERV's fault, I'm blameless. So...guilt-free eating! What's wrong with that?"

"Maya, that is not a good attitude to adopt, especially in your position."

"I...I know. But I can't help it! I'm loving my feasts soooo much! I've never felt so much gusto about food! It's..."

"Excuse me..." said a man, suddenly peering around the still open door "...someone here order a pizza?"

"That would be me!" Maya said, ecstatically and care-free, as if the previous conversation hadn't even happened.

"Huh..." the pizza-guy said "I kinda had a feeling that out of the two of you, you were the one who ordered it."

"Hmph! Just for that, I'm stiffing you on the tip."

"Awww..." sighed the pizza-guy mournfully, as he handed over the towering pile of pizza, and accepted the almost minimum payment.

"Now, where were we?" Maya asked, closing the door, while already starting on one of the pizzas.

"We were talking about how there's a chance your excessive appetite and weight gain might be caused by some immoral substance slipped into your body by tainted food back at NERV, and that it's probably a good idea to--"

"Sorry, but could we continue this conversation after I eat? I feel bad listening to you when I'm half-distracted."

Ritsuko resisted the urge to mutter an obscenity, and leaned back and watched Maya eat. And eat. And eat. She bulldozed through her monolithic stack of pizzas like a printing machine through paper, effortlessly, quickly, efficiently. But, not cleanly...her tight shirt, and huge belly were being well-smeared with sauce and toppings. As a witness to the rather shocking spectacle, Ritsuko found herself feeling...
1511112111.title: The Cause?

choices: Lustful?
Predatory?
15111121111.content:
Maya's talent for eating had, like her size, become a formidably worth accomplishment for two weeks' effort, intended or not.

Ritsuko, ever the scientist, began mentally assessing Maya's condition as the now plus-sized bridge bunny showed she should be first choice if an Angel ever appeared in the shape of a giant pizza.

Intriguing... Maya never struck me as being truly passionate about anything other than science before now. The way she eats... Calling her a messy eater is akin to calling Misato on her days off punch-drunk. The word sloppy comes quickly to mind, but doesn't seem right. More like voracious, or animalistic...

If Maya had eyes or the mental capacity at that moment for anything other than food, she would've shuddered slightly under the intensity of Ritsuko's gaze, and possibly had a hot flush that she was the subject of such a studious gaze from her reason for coming into the insanity that is NERV on a daily basis. However, such was not the case, so Maya kept up her indulgence without a care in the world. Ritsuko, however, wasn't quite able to do the same with her studies of Maya.

I know it's not right that she should be that huge after two weeks, but if she's been eating like this every day, it makes a strange kind of sense... What isn't making sense right now is why this is so fascinating to me. Damn it, why does watching her glut herself feel so... good?

Ritsuko squirmed slightly in her seat, trying to calm a spark and flash of heat which had started. Admittedly, it had been a while since she'd last released tension in THAT way, with or without assistance, but the merest fact she was feeling such a primal response set off a train of thought in her mind.

I'm aroused... How can that be? All that's in front of me is Maya, with her thin face scarfing down enough pizza to feed a city for a week. Watching her throat swallow down the morsels as splatters of sauce stain her shirt... Shirt really is doing that poor rag too much justice by this point; boob tube would be more accurate... Just sitting here watching her stuff her fat ass; again, wrong word, gargantuan or titanic is more accurate. Seeing the end results end up on those massive tree-trunk thunder thighs and that large, soft ass, her massive keg-gut, those titanic knockers that even put Misato's to shame... Oh, God! I actually like her like this!

While Ritsuko's internal voyage of self-discovery (which, it must be admitted, went a lot longer than the short-hand form and is, in its full version, one worthy of Magellan) was in progress, Maya was busy cleaning house. Well, at least of the tower of pizza she ordered. Maya had just finished when she suddenly became aware of just how much she had eaten, and in front of her scientific idol, no less. She looked towards Ritsuko and was about to apologize when she noticed that her guest (whom, she belatedly noticed with a pang of guilt, had made herself a small cup of coffee while Maya had been demolishing the Leaning Tower of Pizza) wasn't entirely with reality at that moment, intently staring at Maya's body with a combination of that scientifically-studios look she so loved, and something a little more...

(Now's your chance to determine who comes onto whom...)

info.description:
As the title reads this interactive is centered solely on the female cast of Neon Genesis Evangelion and expanding the various ladies in several ways.

Before everything begins let me point out a few things:
-The ladies, young and old, can expand in nearly every way possible (no pregnancy though). To make things easier, I myself will try to make the choices available to everyone.

-Try to keep everyone in character (though toning down Shinji's angst is fine with me), there is no limit to the expansion so it's alright to go crazy with it just keep it female-only. Language is fine but keep it within the rating, romance is allowed but actual sex is not as in nothing erotic or beyond the 13 rating, seriously I can not stress this enough if you want something adult go elsewhere. Also don't kill off any of the cast (unless the story begins after a certain incident) which means no vore either, unless the eaten can somehow survive inside the eater's body.

Oh and I should mention while it's very rare for me to do this if I feel an addition needs any sort of editing, be it spelling lack of detail or whatever, please do not take offense I am merely doing so to make things easier to understand/read.

Last but certainly not least I'd like to thank each writer that at one point or another has added to this story. Nearly two hundred chapters, thank you again for supporting this interactive.
